1121.content:
Every villain hates a good superheroine. Every one except for Dennis Thatch. Thatch loves superheroines, so much so that he has devoted his life and considerable means to collecting them. And today, his sights were set on the darling of the Titan Tower.

It was a difficult trap to set, one that required he stage five consecutive crimes to assure that the Titan forces would be divided down to individuals. Then it was a matter of determining where Starfire herself would be deployed, and ambushing her there with a crazy-ass piece of technology that you frankly have no chance of understanding. The end result of this was that one moment the alien girl was rushing her mysterious new foe with her energy-blasts flaring, and the next moment she was roungly seven inches long and being scooped up in a thermos that smelled of old milk.

It was dark, but it was immediately apparent that Starfire was not Thatch's first collection for the day. She found herself packaged up in uncomfortably close proximity with what felt like two other forms. After a few delicate attempts at conversation with these two infuriated individuals, she managed to gather that one was Bumblebee of Titans East, and the other was off-and-on enemy Jinx.

The three girls were finally dumped out of the thermos back at Thatch's lair, which appeared to be nothing more than a basement that probably didn't belong to him.

"Marvelous!" said Thatch, snatching up each girl one by one and admiring her lovingly. "Some of my favorites right here. I'm not just saying that because you're the ones I caught today, either. You three are [i]awesome[/i]."

"Why have you brought us here?" demanded Bumblebee.

"If you intend to interrogate us, you're wasting your time," said Jinx. "I don't respond to torture."

"Heaven forefend!" said Thatch. "No harm will befall any of you here. It is my intent to keep you in as near mint condition as I can, after all!"

"Near [i]what[/i] condition?" said Bumblebee.

"This condition of the mint of which you speak," said Starfire, "Is it painful?"

"Ha! Classic. No, I wouldn't be much of a collector if it was."

"So you're like, what, some kind of giant dork?" guessed Jinx.

"You're so cute when you're mean!" said Thatch. "Don't lose any of that. Really. I want you all to remain your delightful selves for the duration of your captivity here. Try to enjoy it!"

The girls exchanged several glances between them, not entirely sure of what to say.

"Oh, but I am going to be taking off your clothes," said Thatch. "Academic curiosity, after all."

"Wha-?" said Bumblebee, as she was the first to be picked up and plucked of her outfit. "Oh, [i]hell no![/i]"

"You can see how this would be of interest to me," said Thatch. "Nobody's ever seen you ladies naked before, and we've all been wondering how you measure up for a long time now."

He tossed aside Bumblebee's top and pants. The tiny girl, now clad only in a plain white pair of panties, grabbed her breasts and made a dash for it. She didn't make it far before she was back in his grip.

"Okay, the main event here is clearly your ass," said Thatch, removing her last scrap of modesty and turning her over under a magnifying glass. "My compliments."

Starfire and Jinx looked at each other, then took off running in opposite directions.

"[i]No![/i]" Jinx screamed as she was caught by the hem of her skirt. This garment was quickly pulled up over her head, leaving her naked and mysteriously purple body to double up on itself in mortification.

"Wow, now underwear for Jinx?" said Thatch, snapping a photo. "The forum's not going to believe that."

Last came Starfire. He caught her again as she tried to fly through a closed window, then set to work on her tiny skirt.

"This is the body I'm most interested to see, no offence to your peers," said Thatch. "As an alien, just how close are you to humans? I heard a rumor about sideways vaginas, but I'm pretty sure that guy was full of shit."

Skirt, top, panties, bra... there was nothing Starfire could do to avert it. Soon enough she was butt-nekkid in Thatch's hand as he took up his magnifying glass and nodded at her boobies.

"The best breast award goes to this little lady," said Thatch. "I believe these officially qualify as 'tits'."

Thusly denuded, the three girls were deposited in some sort of hamster cage.

125222222222222222222212221.content:
Chisa Tsukamoto, as usual, was spending her days outside of school getting a shipment of manga from various manga groups printed and delivered to their various locations. Although clumsy and fairly short for her age, Chisa is a hard worker and puts 100% into everything she does.

One day when placing ink into the printers for a special colored edition manga, she glanced through the various ink colors to see which one was correct and noticed she saw she hadn't before: "special ink", it read. Chisa was confused by the lack of a proper label, but it WAS the ink she was supposed to, so she carried it slowly but assuringly and headed for the printer.

Unfortunately for poor Chisa, she tripped and spilled the ink all over her body. Then the girl felt funny all around her body...she looked at the nearby tables and noticed everything getting bigger and bigger. Chisa picked up what little ink was left in the container and slowly headed for the printer, but the girl noticed the container was almost the size of herself now! A few seconds later it was even bigger than the girl, and Chisa slipped once again on the ground, dropping what little ink was left on her body. The girl, barely a foot tall, proceeded to shrink even more to a height of only 6 inches tall!

"Oh no!" a worried Chisa cried frustratingly, afraid of not only being smaller, but now she wouldn't even get the printing job finished on time! But did Chisa only shrink, or everything on her...?
125222222222222222222212221.title: Pocket-sized Chisa

1252222222222222222222122212.content:
Chisa looked down at herself and was happy that, despite being covered in ink, everything on her petite body shrank with her, even her hair accessories.

"I better start cleaning up", she thought to herself, looking up at the cabinets that looked like buildings at her height. "But how am I supposed to do that!? Oh, Chisa's in trouble now."

As Chisa began to cry, she heard loud footsteps on the ground. She then looked in front of her to see what was causing them..it was Kazuki! The girl furiously waved on the ground to him to get his attention, and fortunately he did. But Kazuki, needless to say, was very confused.

"Chisa??" was the first thing that came out of his mouth, slipping on the ink himself and letting straight flat on his stomach, now seeing the girl better with his head on the ground. "What happened?? Why are you so tiny!? Am I dreaming?"

Chisa was having a hard time trying to talk to Kazuki. She tried to explain what happened through hand gestures, and occasionally tried to speak to the boy, but notihg came out of her mouth. Kazuki then picked the girl up and placed her on a nearby table, sitting down on a chair next to it.

"That's better", he smiled. "You stay here and I'll clean up this mess for you." Chisa nodded her head down in reply, thankful for the guy's generousity. Before doing that, though, he asked Chisa if he wanted to wash her clothes for her. The girl shook her head left and right, and Kazuki proceeded to get cleaning utensils to clean up the ink spill. Just then Chisa's cell phone began to ring! It was in her purse, located on the other side of the table. Chisa quickly ran up to the phone and was successfull in getting the call through.

"Where's my special edition manga!?" the voice blurted out, annoyed. "Youonly have 3 hours left to deliver my shipment, or I'll be really disappointed!"

"Uh-oh", squeaked Chisa. "I know that voice. It's..."
1252222222222222222222122212.title: Chisa's big mess

12522222222222222222221222121.content:
It was the voice of Yuu Inagawa. Usually quite nice, Yuu could be quite scary when angry or annoyed, and Chisa had seen this for herself before at various comic conventions she had attended.

"I-I-I-I understand, Inagawa-san!" Chisa replied, yelling as loud as she could on the phone. "I'll try to get it to you as soon as I can. There was an accident earlier, and.."

"Accident?" Yuu asked Chisa, sounding more calm now. "Did the Inkjet printer act up again?"

"Actually...I dropped that special ink you were using", Chisa reluctantly told the girl, shivering in fear a little. There was then a short pause on the phone.

"WHAT!?" Yuu blurted out, louder than ever. "That ink cost me quite a bit of money! I'll be down in a few minutes to see this, Chisa!" And with that, Yuu hung up on the tiny Chisa, who then continued to cry once again.

"Oh, I let a friend and customer of mine down", Chisa cried to herself. "If only I wasn't so klutzy and small.."

"Don't be so hard on yourself", Kazuki told her, right behind Chisa. He walked up to her while she was on the phone.

"Oh, Kazuki!", the girl cried, running up to his left arm, wiping her tears on it like a towle. "I let down Yuu! I dropped her special ink she was supposed to use for her manga project and now she's angry at me.."

"There, there", Kazuki told Chisa, patting up very lightly on the head with his let pinky finger. "Where did you get it? I'll go buy it for you."

"I bought it at a store at Akihabara", Chisa shlyl told Kazuki. "Won't that interfere with your day off?

"Of course not", Kazuki smiled. "Helping a friend is more important than goofing off." With that, he picked up Chisa and put her on his left shoulder.

"I'll pay you for the bus fare when we get back", Chisa told Kazuki as the two headed outside the door. Just as Kazuki was about to leave, though, he saw Yuu.

"Kazuki, have you seen Chisa?" Yuu asked him, looking annoyed. "I need to talk to her about something.."

"She's right here", Kazuki told her, putting to the tiny girl on his left shoulder. "We're going to buy more ink right now." Yuu didn't really hear the last sentence properly, though, as she was too busy being fixated on the tiny girl on Kazuki's shoulder.

"C-C-C-C-Chisa?" Yuu asked, freaked out more than just a little. "Is that you?"

"Y-yes", the tiny girl admitted, covering point of her body in Kazuki's shirt. "I'm sorry..."

Slowly Yuu lifted Chisa near her face, allowing her to get a better look at the 6 inch-tall girl.

"She's sooooo cuuuuuuute", Yuu said in a cheerful, sing-song type of voice, pressing the tiny girl into her face. "Can I keep her?!"

"No", bluntly replied Kazuki, with Chisa giving a thankful, "thank goodness" type of sigh.

"Do you use what caused it?" asked Yuu, placing Chisa on top of her own right shoulder.

"It might have something to do with the ink", Chisa said, her tiny voice barely getting to Kazuki, but rang loud and clear to Yuu. "When it spilled on me, it made me shrink."

"You said you bought it in Akihabara. Was it from a store?" Kazuki asked Chisa.

"No. A vendor. It was a special sale, and I thought to myself, 'If Chisa can save her family money, she'll do so.' And so I ended up taking 10 gallons or so hope with me in my arms."

"BY YOURSELF!?" asked a shocked Kazuki and Yuu, both at once. Chisa nodded her head up and down in reply.

"So we just have to find that vendor", Yuu said to Kazuki, walking back inside and to the area where Chisa dropped the ink, Kazuki not too far behind her. "I'll go see if there's any proof near the ink.."

"Inagawa-san!! Don't go in there!!" a worried Chisa tried to explain to Yuu, but it was too little, too late. Yuu accidentally slipped on top of the special ink and fell flat on her butt. The fall parachuted Chisa into the air, who was then rescued quite quickly by Kazuki. The duo looked in shock and horror as Yuu slowly began to shrink in size, though at the moment she could only notice the stains of ink on her.

"Oh man!", Yuu moaned, standing up from the fall, covered in ink all over the place. "Hey Chisa, do you have some tow..." Yuu proceeded to stop right there when she saw the taller Kazuki.

"Kazuki! When did you get so tall?" Yuu asked in a worried tone of voice, unaware that she had just then shrunk to 3 feet in height.

"Inagawa-san, Kazuki-san didn't grow! You're shrinking!!" Chisa yelled to her friend, who freaked out upon the news. Unfortunately for her, Yuu slipped again on the ink and started to shrink to an even smaller height of about 2 feet tall.

"Oh man! Everything looks so tall now.." Yuu said to herself as she saw the machinery around the printing area. "This ink is from Eimi!!" Yuu yelled. "I bet this was a set-up to get me out of the way! She wanted to use the fumes of the ink to shrink me and get rid of me!"

"How terrible", Chisa said, shocked by the deed that Eimi done. "We have to find her!"

"Yes we do", a confident Yuu said in agreement, placing her left hand on her chest. "In the name of all that is good in doujin. Kazuki, go call Eimi up right now. You know her number, right?"

"Use my phone, Kazuki", Chisa chimed in, pointing to her cell phone on a nearby table. "Her number's on speed dial." "No! Not like that!" Hitomi screamed, quickly jumping out of the water. She wasn't in for long, but enough to make a difference. She was now barely over 2 inches high! Hitomi then contemplated tripping Kokoro in the water. She even began to reach her leg out.

"No, Hitomi! Don't do it", screamed Kasumi.

"She might be our only chance to fix this!", added Lei-Fang.

"Don't drop that!" The old man said as Lei Fang placed an old box made out of paper that contained many old potions up on a shelf.

Lei Fang had taken a part time job at an old shop to earn some extra cash and regretted that decision as she finally managed to put the box down.

After putting the box down, Lei Fang hopped off the ladder. The ladder wobbled a little and the box that Lei Fang had just let go of fell down on top of her. The potions spilled all over Lei Fang's body.

"Ugh, yuck! What are these things?" Lei Fang asked.

"You idiot! Look what you've done!" The old man shouted at her.

"Relax, so you dock me a little pay. That's not that big a deal, is it?" Lei Fang said.

"No, you idiot! Those potions... Fine, never mind..." The old man sighed.

"See." Lei Fang said.

13122212.content:
A few hours of work later, Lei Fang was done for the day. And aside from the potion spill from earlier, nothing else went wrong that day. The hungry college student decided to head back to her place to heat up some leftovers she had from the day before. Either that, or order some pizza or something. Fortunately it was a walkable distance and after only 20 minutes Lei Fang was back in her dorm.

When she walked into her dorm she saw that she had one new message on her answering machine. She decided to let it play and heard a familiar voice: it was Hitomi. The girl sounded like she was warning her about something, but Lei Fang was currently changing into different clothes. As she changed, she felt odd...like her clothes were growing. She then looked in the rest of her drawers, and noticed that not only did her clothes get bigger, but so was the distance from her hands to the drawers. Lei Fang quickly put two and two together and noticed she was shrinking! She quickly ran to her phone, now barely over 3 feet tall, and replayed the message she heard before. The message from Hitomi told her:

"Lei Fang, this is Hitomi! I heard about your accident at work, and I have to warn you about those potions that spilled on you. They're shrinking potions! The man who runs the shop says he knows a way to fix your height, so call me when you get home. Bye!"

Shortly after the call, the shrinking Lei Fang, now barely over two feet high, grabbed her phone after struggling to climb up to the table it was on to get it. By the time she started dialing Hitomi's phone she was already shrinking even more, now barely over a foot tall. Fortunately Hitomi answered the phone.

"Hitomi!?" shouted Lei Fang on the phone. "It's me, Lei Fang! I got your call as soon as I could! Please come over to my place as soon as possible!" The shrinking college student waited for a response from her friend, but only heard chuckling.

"I'm so sorry, Lei Fang", Hitomi replied, still laughing a little. "But you sound so funny at your height. I'll be right over!" With that, Lei Fang lifted the phone up with both of her hands and placed it back on the hook. She then slowly climbed down the table, to where she reached her final spurt of shrinking, now 6 inches tall. Unfortunately the clothes she had on did not shrink with her, but Lei Fang was more worried over whether Hitomi would arrive soon enough. Would she?
13122212.title: Tiny student.

was just plain shrinking with her clothes (which is still pretty weird)
13212.content:
Bison had Cammy cornered. Fearing that she was going to be captured, Cammy ingested the strange capsule that was secretly being kept.

"Ah, ah, ah... That won't do." Bison said as he powered up.

Bison's strange psycho powers counteracted the capsule and did something rather unexpected. Cammy began shrinking. In fact, Cammy...
13212.title: This needs a little white

132122.content:
Cammy noticed that her form-fitting leotard, and her signature red baret, were also shrinking with her. That fact was comforting to her somewhat, but it wasn't enough to take her mind off of what had just happened to her. She glanced down at the capsule in her still shrinking hand and remembered how she had gotten it...

___

It was about a week ago at the Delta Red's base, when Cammy and the team had learned of Bison's movements and recent evil-doings in the world. Hearing of her long time nemesis made Cammy want to fight him right away, and the team agreed to set up plans to take down Bison and his gang once and for all.
Cammy got ready to take off for the fight, but the team's resident computer expert/scientist stopped her just before she left. He told her of a newly developed drug that would enhance any fighters latent fighting skill tenfold, and also boost their overall strength as well. Cammy was, of course, eager to try it herself. So she took several capsules of it with her.

Throughout her assault on Bison's new base, Cammy used the capsules, to great success. They had worked perfectly, making Cammy ten times the fighter she already was, and making it easy for her to put Bison's forces to shame. But she soon noticed that the effect only lasted for a few short minutes. Cammy wasn't too worried about that little side-effect though, she had plenty capsules to spare and there were no other negative side-effects that she could see. So she kept using them to keep up the fight, until she ran down to her last capsule. Cammy tucked it away for later, thinking to save it for her big fight with Bison.

After that, the rest of her fights had been easy enough for the accomplished woman. That is, until she came face-to-face with Bison himself...

___

Now, having been forced to use her last trump card after a long battle with Bison, and only to have it backfire on her immensely. Cammy was rightly scared of being captured, or worse! She watched in fear as her long-time foe steadily grew before her, appearing to become bigger and stronger, while she got smaller and weaker. The process stopped a moment later, leaving the shrunken Cammy at only 3 inches tall. She'd now have a hard time fighting just one of Bison's fingers, let alone the man himself!

"Now that I've given you time to realize your mistake of coming against me, you must understand that you will never defeat me." Bison taunted her. Oh how Cammy wished she could just knock that smirk of his face right now.

"Oh, back off if you think this is all it'll take to bring me down!" Cammy shouted. But to her surprise, her voice came out more like a high-pitched squeak. The British woman felt her face turn a little red from that.

Bison just laughed. "You see, Cammy. I knew of your little capsules beforehand, and have spent time adjusting my psycho powers accordingly. And, thanks to the little 'kick' that your capsules have in them, it, combined with my psycho powers, was enough to pull off this little move!" Bison explained. He moved closer to her. "I've told you before I have no use for you... but now that I think about it, there may a use for you in your new state after all..."

The comment made Cammy sick, she could only imagine what Bison and his thugs would do to her at her reduced size. But Cammy didn't have long to think about it, as Bison suddenly reached down for Cammy, his huge form moved so fast the tiny woman barely had time to react. Cammy...
132122.title: Cammy's story

1321222.content:
Cammy's instincts kicked in at the last second, and she literally jumped into action, hefting herself over Bison's large hand. Bison was a little surprised that the shrunken Cammy still had any fight left in her, and it took him a moment before he tried to grab her tiny form again. But it was too late, as Cammy had already dashed down the side of the wall and was making her escape!

Cammy ran as fast as her tiny legs could carry her. She was thankful her shrinking hadn't reduced her body's athletic capabilities out of proportion, so moving with at her shrunken size was just as easy as when she was normal sized.
As Cammy ran, she knew in the back of her mind that she'd not make it out of Bison's grasp without a plan. It was then that she noticed a, quite conveniently placed air duct on the wall just ahead. It was open, thankfully, and low enough that Cammy could jump into it. So when the three-inch high Cammy came close enough, that was just what she did. She felt Bison's hand knick her as she just barely made it into the duct in time.

"Curse you, Cammy!" Bison shouted, his psycho powers flaring up around his body. "I will get you! You'll never make it out of this base!"

Cammy smiled as she pulled herself up into the duct, glad to be away from the psycho, and also taking a little pleasure in making him so angry.

It's the little things. Cammy thought. But then winced as she realized the implications of that thought. She shook it off then fixed her beret on her head, it slipped off a bit when she jumped. Touching it now, it made her feel a little more safe to have it still fit her at her new size. Well, whatever. It's time to get out of here... but, oh my...

Cammy's surprise came when she finally got a good look at the inside of the ducts. It was dark and, even at her shrunken size, tightly cramped. Cammy had to crawl around in the ducts, as she did she found things were worse than that. The duct Cammy was in wasn't just a single straight tunnel, no, there were many turns the shrunken blond had to make as she made her way through the ducts. She felt like a mouse in some kind of test maze, it was humiliating, to say the least. All she wanted right now was to get out of this place and back to her team, hopefully they'd find a way to restore her to normal size.

Her wish was granted when Cammy finally made it to the exit of the duct. Luckily for her the exit wasn't sealed off with anything, so it was just a matter of crawling the last foot or so to her freedom. Once Cammy was out, she found that she was...
1321222.title: Tiny in the tunnels

choices: It was Bison who entered. He's well aware of Cammy's prescene in the room
It was some lesser thug who came in. Cammy is able to sneak past him
13212221.content:
"N-No!" Cammy cried at what she saw as she neared the exit hole of the vents.

She was still in Bison's base! She was banking on escaping through the vents, but it seemed that plan was now sunk. Although being trapped in enemy territory wasn't exactly a new situation for Cammy, but being trapped in enemy territory at only 3 inches tall? That made Cammy worry.
But she was trapped, so she had to think of a new strategy now. Being only 3 inches tall made her vulnerable, but also hard to spot, and Cammy knew using this to her advantage was the way to go.

Poking her head out of the vents, Cammy saw that the room wasn't as large as where she had fought Bison, it was more of a hallway. She was grateful that the vents hadn't looped around and lead her right back to her hated enemy. But she knew Bison wasn't going to let her go so easily, and she then noticed a camera on the ceiling, pointing right at her.

"Bison's probably watching the exits. He's probably watching me right now!" Cammy muttered to herself. She thought Bison might show up any moment to grab her.

So Cammy through caution to the wind and leapt down and out of the vent tunnel, a small jump at her size. Cammy ran along the walls of the hall when she noticed that the camera on the ceiling was following her, thus confirming her suspicions.
She also thought that this area of the base didn't look familiar to her at all, she hadn't passed through it when she stormed in earlier. But Bison's base didn't connect to any other buildings, as far as she knew, so she thought she must still be in it.

She also had to stay on guard. So far, Cammy had only been beating up Bison's lesser goons before, so running into a stronger opponent such as Vega or Balrog was a possibility here; one that she hoped to avoid, even being seen by a regular soldier could be deadly for the shrunken woman.

There were two doors on either side of the hallway, and eventually Cammy made it close to one of them. She didn't have anything to go on in this unknown area, so she had just picked one at random. But then she came to a problem, the handle was way too high for her to reach, she could never open the door at her size! Crawling under the door was an option either, as the door was too low to allow for even that.

Regardless of these unfortunate circumstances, Cammy still made her way towards the door, hoping she'd find some way to get out of here by the time she made it over. Luck was on Cammy's side as the door started to open just as she made it there.

"Yes!" Cammy cheered. Now all she had to do was sneak past whoever it was coming in through the door...
13212221.title: Still in Bison's base

choices: Cammy makes a break for it
Cammy gets kicked by the scientist
132122212.content:
As the door slowly opened, Cammy dashed to the corner of the hall to hide from whoever was coming. The door opened and one of Bison's soldiers came in. No one that Cammy recognized, it must have just been one of his many "nameless" goons.

The goon was alone, and from the way he passed right on through the hallway, he didn't seem to know about Cammy's reduction and escape from Bison. The tiny Cammy took the chance and snuck behind him, and ran through the doorway. The door slammed behind her just as she made it through, knocking a gust of air at the tiny Cammy that nearly threw her off her feet.

"Whoa." Cammy squeaked as she collected herself. "Okay, that's done... Am I out now?"

Cammy looked around at the new room she was in and saw that she wasn't out of the woods just yet. She had entered another large room, this one was lab-like. There were lab desks and lab stools ordered throughout the room, they were very high up so even Cammy could see the beakers and other scientist stuff on top of them.

Just what is Bison planning here? Cammy wondered.

As Cammy walked further into the room she saw that it wasn't as empty as the other one, there were a few people in lab coats talking amongst themselves. They were far away enough that Cammy wasn't worried about being seen by them, but it still unnerved the shrunken woman to be this close to a normal sized person, especially ones that worked for Bison.

Cammy darted across the room and hid under one of the nearby stools. When she was sure she was safe, she took another look around the room, but with the desk in front of her blocking most of her view she couldn't see any exits, other than the way she just came. All she saw was the scientists, they were still quite a ways from her, but their conversation seemed to have just ended and one was coming her way!

Before Cammy could react, the giant sat down on the stool she was hiding under. The tiny fighter froze, hoping she hadn't been seen by him somehow. Seconds ticked by as she waited to be captured, but nothing happened. The scientist hadn't seen her after all. Cammy relaxed, and she thought that she was far too small to be seen so easily.

Knowing that staying here would not be a good idea, Cammy got ready to move, hoping that the scientist wouldn't see her running along the floor. But the scientist's huge feet then started to move, and Cammy saw that this guy was shaking his feet, blocking her path!
Cammy looked up, but couldn't see anything past the seat of the stool. She groaned. If this guy didn't stop shaking his feet, not only could she not escape from under the stool, he was liable to hit her!

Cammy knew she had to do something...
132122212.title: Lab rat Cammy

choices: Was laying on the floor of the lab
1321222122.content:
Cammy couldn't believe how careless this scientist seemed. But she'd have to worry about it later, for now, the shrunken fighter was going to try and make a break for it!

Defending her upper body with her arms, Cammy ran out from under the stool. The scientist's gigantic feet kicking recklessly as the tiny woman made her escape. One foot connected with her, but Cammy saw it coming and blocked it, shoving the huge foot away. The scientist didn't seem to feel this though.

Cammy was almost out of reach of the attacking feet when, all of a sudden, she felt one hit her in the back. Hard. Her tiny body was flung across the floor until she smacked into another desk several feet away. The impacts knocked the tiny Cammy out.

When Cammy awoke some time later, she found that she...
1321222122.title: Cammy deFEETed

13212221222.content:
Cammy rubbed her head as she got up. That kick really did a number on her, but luckily for the tiny blonde she wasn't too badly hurt. Her whole body ached, but she didn't have anything broken. Her legs ached the worst, they must've taken the brunt of the impact when she hit the desk. Cammy found when she stood that just walking around was hard to do.

"Ugh... That bloody scientist..!" Cammy groaned. "I swear I'd knock his block off if I could! Agh! If only I wasn't so bloody small!"

Cammy's revenge would have to wait though, and she knew it. So instead of plotting her revenge she tried to focus and regain her bearings. She had been knocked out, and she didn't know for how long. But she did see now that she was still in the same lab from before, under one of the many desks in the room. She exhaled in relief, she may be 3 inches tall, but she was glad that at least she wasn't in Bison's hands. Cammy started walking, more of a limp really, around the lab. Hopefully she'd find the exit somewhere around here.

But before Cammy could make any real progress, a huge pair of feet passed right by her, startling the shrunken woman, who froze in her tracks. Cammy looked up to see that it was one of Bison's men.

Vega!? Cammy thought.

It was indeed Vega, the masked man was now a giant to the tiny blonde. He stopped several feet away from Cammy, and pulled out a handheld transceiver.

"Nothing here either, boss." Vega said. "Another look around? Fine. But if find her, I'm keeping her!" Vega hissed, and hung up.

Cammy gulped as she heard the giant get angry. Vega was looking for her, that much was sure, and now he was saying he was going to keep her if he found her? Cammy couldn't bear to let that happen. So she ran, or rather, limped from the giant. She had gotten far from her cover of the desk, and now she just wanted to get back and hide until Vega left.

Does she make it?
13212221222.title: Same place, different danger

choices: Vega continues his torture of Cammy here
Vega decides to take Cammy with him to his room
132122212222.content:
The tiny, British woman's escape seemed to be sure, until her injured leg got in the way. Cammy made one wrong step and twisted her leg on accident, causing her to fall to the floor and yell out in pain.

"AAAAGHH! Dammit!" Cammy screamed.

Her eyes went wide when she realized her mistake, and she covered her mouth to quiet herself. But it was too late, as she then heard a huge foot slam down behind her. Terrified, Cammy slowly turned around to see Vega's monstrous form looking down at her. The masked fighter never looked so threatening. She tried to get up and run away, but her legs wouldn't let her, and she could do nothing but watch on in horror as Vega's massive hand reached for her.

"Ah, finally." Vega said breathily, as if he had worked so hard to capture his tiny prey.

Vega laughed as he picked up the tiny blonde. The masked man was glad to be the one who found her. He knew he couldn't really keep her, like he threatened before, but he could still have some fun with her before turning her over.

"Cammy White." He started. Then slowly turned the tiny, defense woman over in his hand to check her out. "You've always been one of the more, beautiful fighters in tournaments. Not as beautiful as myself, of course, but you're definitely no slouch. I can see why the boss wants you so bad."

"Oh, shut up! Do you find pleasure in taking advantage of a helpless woman!?" Cammy shouted, and spat on Vega's hand. She was trying to keep up appearances of being tough, but it was hard to do when her body, and voice, were so small.

Vega had laughed at the tiny woman's cries, but then got angry and growled at her when she spat on his hand.

"Little puta!" He shouted.

Vega then spat down at the shrunken woman, but Cammy managed to avoid most of it. But Vega wasn't pleased with just that. Using his free hand, Vega buried Cammy's little hard in the area he had spat on, humiliating the tiny brit.

"How do you like it!?" Vega barked.

After several more seconds of torture, Vega let up on Cammy. He delivered a quick flick of his finger to her tiny body, making the 3 inch tall woman scream and recoil in pain, before finally letting her rest in his hand. Cammy's head hurt a lot afterwards, and she had to wipe the spit from her face, but it was her legs that still hurt the most, she rubbed them to ease some of the pain.

"You hurt your legs?" Vega asked. "That's why you didn't run before, I thought it was strange. Ha ha ha!"

Vega laughed at the pathetic sight of the one of the world's former top female fighters, now reduced to a mere plaything for him, as he thought of what to do with her next. While Cammy was in hell, being caught by this madman was worse than she imagined, and with her entire body reeling in pain, she couldn't do anything but wait and see what the masked man had in store for her next.
132122212222.title: Cammy captured

choices: Vega sits down, he'd made it to his room!
1321222122222.content:
"Here. We're going to my room." Vega said, smirking behind his mask. He stuffed the 3 inch Cammy into his pants pocket before she could even start to protest. "Well, at least I won't have to worry about you running away." Vega laughed.

"Aahh!" Cammy cried as she fell through the air, Vega had dropped her rather carelessly into his pocket. She landed into the soft space of his pants pocket. "Ugh..." She moaned.

Cammy was miserable. As if being 3 inches tall wasn't bad enough, breaking her leg, being held captive by an evil man like Vega, covered in his spit, and kept in his pocket, made it all the worse for the shrunken woman. Cammy had half a mind to break down and cry, but she knew she couldn't give up just yet.

Cammy's ride wasn't a soft one, as her tiny body bounced and shook slightly with each step Vega took. The masked man had told her he was taking her to his room. Cammy wondered what he meant by that, had Bison and his gang built living spaces for themselves, and what did he plan to do with her once they reached his room?

Cammy shook her head, that wasn't the important part here, her mind was wandering from trying not to think of how much she hurt right now. What she needed to do was escape from Vega somehow. But at her size, and with her broken legs, it didn't seem very likely she would be able to.

So her legs were out, Cammy knew, but she still had her arms. She thought she could climb out of Vega's pocket and make her escape without him noticing. Grabbing onto the fabric of Vega's pants, Cammy pulled herself up. The tiny blonde found it to be rather easy, and her legs weren't so hurt that she couldn't use them, so she was able to use almost all her strength to climb.

I can do this! Cammy assured herself in thought.

With a determined grin on her face, Cammy climbed higher and higher in Vega's pants pocket, until...
1321222122222.title: Puny in the pockets

choices: Cammy continues to climb down slowly
13212221222221.content:
Light shined on Cammy's face as she climbed the last few centimeters out of Vega's pocket. The tiny fighter hefted herself up and rested on the top of her former prison.

Cammy was surprised to see that Vega had taken her outside of the base, she was now in the area just outside Bison's base. She figured that the living quarters of the base must be in another building.

Well, Vega. Thanks for helping me get out of that dreadful base, but I'm still gonna have to smack you around later! Cammy thought, grinning confidently at this turn of events.

Looking down Cammy saw that the drop to the floor was a long one, with her already injured legs she didn't want to risk making a jump down there. Above she could see Vega's body stretch high above her miniaturized form, the masked fighter didn't seem to be aware that she had escaped from his pocket yet, and Cammy wasn't about to give the time to find out.

She climbed over and down the other side of Vega's pants, and started her descent. Slowly at first, until she saw that Vega was entering another building, the living quarters, Cammy assumed. Her giant captor was only a few yards from the building. Cammy had to think fast; could she make the drop to the ground now and risk hurting herself even more, or would she play it safe and keep climbing down slowly and hope she can escape from this new building without Vega noticing?
13212221222221.title: Out, but not free

132122212222211.content:
There's no way I'm letting myself be caught by that creeper again! Cammy thought. And then she jumped! Right off of Vega's pants and entered a free-fall as she fell all the way down to the ground, about a 30 feet jump to the 3 inch tall woman.

The shrunken blonde tried to get control of her body as she fell to land as safely as possible, but it all happened too fast. In almost an instant, her tiny 3 inch body landed roughly on the hard ground in the worst possible way, right on her already hurt legs. She yelled out in pain, but only for a moment before controlling herself, she couldn't risk having Vega hear her cries. She covered her mouth with her hands, as little tears started to well up in her eyes. She thought that if her legs hadn't been broken before, they were now, that's how badly her legs pained her.

The tiny woman lay there for a while as she tried to collect herself. She managed to get a glimpse of Vega's giant form as he walked into the building, unknowingly leaving her behind, and she thought for the briefest of moments that at least she was away from the psycho. But out in the open, 3 inches tall and with her legs shot, she was far from safe.

It took Cammy only another moment before her fighter instincts kicked in and she started to pull herself away from the scene. There was a lot of grass nearby that Cammy thought would make for good cover at her size. So the shrunken woman slowly and excruciatingly moved into the tall grass, her legs aching all the while. But even so, something told her that she wouldn't be safe getting only a little bit away from the front door of the building, she knew she needed to go farther, in case Vega came looking for her. So she kept up her crawl, and moved further into the grass.

After several minutes of this, her body gave out, and she could go no further, and she passed out again. When she awoke, she found that she wasn't outside and under the grass anymore, she was inside. In fact she was now...
132122212222211.title: A risky move

choices: Yes, but it's not going to be easy to do
No, I'm afraid there's no cure that we're aware of
1321222122222112.content:
Cammy was surprised to see that she was back at Delta Red's base, her base! She couldn't believe it, her team must've found her somehow and saved her! Right now, she was laying on a table in a room she recognized as the Delta Red lab. And she wasn't alone either, she realized when she heard a voice.

"She's awake!"

Cammy got up, ecstatic to see her comrades again, but then was reminded of her tiny stature when she did. She was still only 3 inches tall. Cammy didn't know what she expected, but she hoped that her team would find a way to restore her soon.

"Cammy, are you alright?" The voice from before asked. Then Cammy got to see who it was when his giant face invaded her vision, startling the shrunken woman a little. It was the team's resident scientist/computer expert, the same one who had given her the capsules that ended up shrinking her.

He pulled away quickly after seeing her reaction to him. "Oh, sorry. I just wanted to make sure you're okay." He said, writing something down on a clipboard. He went on to explain to her how the team was able to track her to the woods just outside of Bison's base, Cammy had managed to crawl quite far in her injured state, and how the team was able to evac her via helicopter. "So that's what happened." He finished.

"I'm glad you guys showed up when you did, any longer and I'd have been done for!" Cammy said.

The scientist nodded. "Now, how are you feeling?" He asked.

"How do you think?" Cammy asked, a little upset, her pride still broken, along with her legs. But then she gasped, when she noticed something different in her legs, they didn't hurt at all! "Wh-What? My legs!" She exclaimed.

"Your welcome." The scientist said shortly. He pulled up a chair and sat down in front of Cammy's tiny form. "You've got a special concoction of mine to thank for that!"

"Oh, thank you." Cammy said, giving the man a little bow to show her thanks. "Thank god it didn't turn out like the last one you made."

"Yes. I found that, after running some tests on you while you were out, that the capsule I made ended up causing you to end up.. well, like this."

"Tiny?"

"... Yeah." The scientist seemed to feel guilty for Cammy's shrinking. But Cammy wasn't about to let him off easy.

"Did you find a cure?" She asked.

The scientist sighed, then answered...
1321222122222112.title: Diminutive at Delta Red's base

13212221222221121.content:
"Yes, but it's not going to be easy to do." The scientist stated.

"Oh, no." Cammy sounded worried. The tiny woman sat down at the edge of the table, and then asked the giant before her hesitantly, "What needs to be done to cure me?"

"Well, the tests we ran on you determined that it was Bison's powers that made you shrink in the first place, counteracting the strength increasing capsule I gave you." The scientist explained. "You're not going to like this."

"Go on." Cammy said.

"The only way you can ever be restored to your normal size again is if you get Bison to use his psycho powers on you again." The scientist explained.

"What!" Cammy shouted. The tiny woman got up and stomped her little foot on the table. "Why!?"

"Listen, listen!" The scientist tried to get Cammy to calm down. "When we extracted you from Bison's base, we also picked up something on our radars. Bison's got a lab in there."

Cammy remembered the lab, it was where she had been knocked out cold by a careless scientist - one that was much like the one in front of her right now. Cammy was intrigued to hear her scientist comrade bring it up. "I was there. What about it?" She asked.

"Yes. We noticed on your tracking device." The scientist said. "Now, the lab appears to contain a capsule, much like the one I developed. But this capsule has the opposite effect of mine..."

"It makes you weaker?" Cammy asked. The scientist nodded.

"It makes you weaker." He replied. "We think Bison was trying to mass produce them to take down his many other enemies."

"How does that help me? I'm already weak enough!" Cammy shouted, motioning to her tiny form.

"Now, now. We believe that if Bison was to use his powers on you after you ingested this capsule, then the resulting effects would make you grow!" The scientist explained.

"Are you sure?" Cammy asked, skeptical of this plan.

"Well, we're ninety-nine percent sure, so yes." The scientist stated confidently. "But there's one other thing.."

"What is it?" Cammy asked, shaking her head. She couldn't believe this plan would really work, but on the off chance that it did, she'd risk anything to try it.

"All the capsules are in Bison's lab, you'll have to break into the base again." The scientist explained.

Well, maybe not anything... Cammy thought.

But Cammy found herself reluctantly agreeing to do the plan after her team explained it to her further. Since she was so small, Cammy would have to break into the base by herself, steal the capsule, and trick Bison into using his powers on her. The risk was huge, but the rewards, Cammy thought, were worth it.

A few days later, Cammy was prepped and ready to go back into Bison's base, 3 inches tall and all by herself. The tiny blond tried not to let it get to her, and focused instead on what her team had told her to do. She'd been given special equipment as well to make her mission easier.

Hours later, Cammy found herself standing in front of Bison's base once again...
13212221222221121.title: A cure for Cammy

choices: Cammy gets caught in a trap
Cammy makes it through the ducts without any problems
132122212222211211.content:
Cammy was in front of Bison's base again, but not exactly at the front door of the facility. She had been dropped off by her team near a ventilation shaft, much like the one she had crawled through to escape Bison after she first shrunk.

The tiny woman approached it cautiously, there didn't seem to be anybody on the outside of the base, but Cammy was more worried about Bison possibly setting up a trap in the ducts. Nothing was set off when she touched the grate though, much to Cammy's relief, so the tiny brit pulled with all her strength to get the thing off. It was hard work, but Cammy managed to pull it off.

"Whew... That wasn't easy." Cammy said, breathing heavily after her little workout. She wiped the sweat from her brow. Then, she heard a short static sound coming from her earpiece, given to her before the mission started.

"Are you in?" The voice on the other line asked, it was Delta Red's scientist.

"Yeah, I'm going in." Cammy said, sounding confident. "I'll update you in a minute. Over and out."

Another short static noise buzzed in Cammy's ear, telling her that her teammate was off the line. She pushed the grate aside and crawled into the ducts. At her tiny size getting inside the base through the shaft would be easy.
132122212222211211.title: Strong start for the shrunken fighter

choices: Cammy makes it to the lab
1321222122222112112.content:
The going was easy in the ducts. Cammy didn't take long to reach the end of the maze-like ventilation system, she had memorized the layout provided to her by her team before leaving, and enter the first room of the base. Where, thankfully, there was no grate blocking her way in. She peeked her little head out of the duct to see that she was now in a hall. She ducked back into the duct and put her hand to her ear and called her team.

"I'm in." She said.

"Great work, Cammy!" Delta Red's scientist congratulated her. "You should be in a hallway now..?"

"Yeah, there's a hall." Cammy told him. "I'm looking at it right now. The lab's on the left, right?"

"Yes. Go left from there and the lab should be there."

"Got it." Cammy replied. "You know, not that I'm complaining, but couldn't you have given me some more of those power capsules?"

"I'm sorry, Cammy. But you used up all of the strength increasing capsules I made on your first mission to Bison's base." The scientist said. "And we can't wait around to make any more, since we don't know if Bison will be on the move after your initial assault."

"Yeah, yeah. I know." Cammy groaned. "It would be nice to have some backup though."

"Well... you already know why we can't offer you that." Her ally replied.

"Alright. I'm going in further now. Wish me luck." Cammy told him.

"Good luck." The scientist replied. There was a short static sound, and the line went dead.

Cammy sighed, this was not a great plan. But she was already well into it, and doing well so far. So she pressed on wards into the next room.

The tiny woman made sure there wasn't anybody in the room before she jumped out of the ducts and onto the floor of the hall, where she started to run across it as fast as her tiny legs would allow her to. Above, there was a camera following her movements like before. Cammy was well aware of it, but hoped her speed would allow her to escape without incident. Then, as she ran, the tiny woman in the green leotard couldn't believe her luck when she saw the door to the lab was already open. It was like Bison wanted her to break in.

She didn't have much further to go to get to the lab.
1321222122222112112.title: Little woman on the inside

13212221222221121121.content:
Cammy's smooth ride continued as she made it into the lab with no problems. The tiny 3 inch tall woman started to get a little suspicious about how easy this was.

No guards, no real security.. Could Bison be setting a trap? Cammy wondered as she ran into the lab.

Inside, Cammy saw that it hadn't changed since she was last here. There weren't any scientists around this time, as far as she could see from her bugs-eye viewpoint, but since it was night she didn't think it was too odd.
Cammy looked above herself and saw her target, the weakening capsule, kept held up by three prongs on one of the desks. Cammy ran under the desk, then called her support team.

"I'm in the lab." She stated. "And I see the capsule."

"Good job, Cammy." Her ally congratulated her. "You'll have to climb up one of the desks to get the capsule. Do you still have the equipment I gave you?"

"Yeah. I'm about to use it now." Cammy said. "It's amazing you were able to make this thing so quickly."

"Anything to help you."

"Yeah? Well, thanks. I'll let you know how it goes." Cammy said and hung up.

Cammy grabbed the secret item she'd been saving for just this moment, a miniature grappling hook, kept holstered on her back. The thing was just the right size for her to use, and it felt good as she tested it's weight for the coming toss.

"I hope this works." Cammy said to herself.

She tossed to grappling hook up to the top of the desk, and waited for a moment. She heard a "click" sound a moment later, confirming to her that the grappling hook had caught on the wooden surface above.

"Yes!" Cammy cheered.

The shrunken fighter wasted no time now, she started to climb up the rope of the hook as quickly as possible. Luck had been on her side so far, and she wasn't about to blow it by being too slow now, near the end of her mission.

The climb wasn't tough at all for Cammy, her years of training had well prepared her for such things, and the 3 inch woman made the 2 feet high climb in mere minutes. Once at the top, Cammy took a moment to collect her breath and relax before getting the capsule and making the climb back down.

As she rested she looked over across the expansive area of the desk and saw that...
13212221222221121121.title: Little in the lab

132122212222211211212.content:
Cammy gasped when she saw the the capsule she had come here for was missing! Almost in a panic about how it could have disappeared on her, Cammy ran over to the prongs that previously held it.

"Where is it!?" She shouted, activating her comms device.

"What's wrong? Cammy?!" Delta Red's scientist asked over the airwaves.

"The capsule, it's gone!" Cammy responded. She looked around the room for any sign of it, then gasped again at what she saw. "No! V-Vega!" She shouted.

The giant masked man had somehow snuck up behind her. He held the capsule in his hand, as if to mock his tiny adversary. He raised his hand to strike Cammy, and the little woman was too surprised to react fast enough.

"Vega!? Wha-" Was all she could hear from her teammate before Vega's massive hand delivered a powerful backhanded blow to her body, knocking her earpiece out.

"Ungh!" Cammy moaned in pain. Vega's hit knocked Cammy back several relative feet, sending her to the edge of the desk. Cammy scrambled to her feet and stared down the giant, or rather, up, at the giant. Vega sneered down at her.

"Last time I went easy on you!" He hissed. "This time I'm just going to finish you off!"

Then, with almost lightning fast movements, Vega reached for Cammy. The 3 inch tall female fighter...
132122212222211211212.title: Return of Vega

choices: Cammy reloads in time, and fires
1321222122222112112122.content:
The 3 inch tall female fighter reacted quickly and jumped high into the air, easily dodging Vega's grab attempt. She deftly landed on his hand and started to clamber up it.

"So you've healed!" Vega said, a little impressed by Cammy's ability to fight even when she was so small.

Vega smacked his hand down on his arm, flat as not to cut his own arm off with his claw, as he tried to hit Cammy. But the tiny blonde was too nimble, too adaptable to the situations, to be hit. Swinging up and down and all around on Vega's arm, using his long sleeve to maneuver so gracefully, Cammy avoided his attacks and ran straight up his arm to his shoulder, where she prepared her attack.

"Canon Spike!" Cammy shouted, leaping high into the air to deliver her signature move, a spiraling kick right to the underside of Vega's chin. Cammy connected her attack perfectly, knocking Vega's mask off in the process, and making the giant reel back from pain.

"You dare attack my face!?" Vega screamed, rubbing the blood off of his chin. The mask was off, and now he was even more pissed off.

Meanwhile, Cammy had managed to use the momentum of her move to push herself back on the desk. Where she wasted no time in dashing towards her grappling hook, thinking to use it against Vega. She picked up the device and began to reload it. Vega was right on top of her now though, and just about to grab for her again, and...
1321222122222112112122.title: Rematch

choices: Cammy is hurt badly by the fall
13212221222221121121221.content:
Cammy's grappling hook gun was reloaded. She smirked. Then turned to Vega, aiming the device at him, she fired. The hook shot out, and in a flash, hit Vega smack dab in his left eye.

"AGH!" Vega cried out in pain. He recoiled back and quickly covered up his eye, tossing the offending hook - along with the device as a whole - out onto the floor below a moment later. After a few seconds of this, he turned and glared at Cammy. The shrunken woman knew she had made him mad, but now she felt confident that she could beat him.

Vega smashed his hands down on the desk Cammy was on, not even caring to see if he was hitting her or not in his rage. Tiny Cammy was able to remain calm, calm enough at least, to dodge his wild and reckless attacks, and wait for an opportunity to strike.

Cammy's chance came a moment later, and she jumped on one of his hands and started to do a repeat of her previous assault on the giant, running up his arm again. Vega was too blind with rage to notice the tiny woman climbing her way up his arm, and although he didn't try to actively attack her like before, the wild flailing of his arm nearly threw Cammy off of his arm more than a few times on her way up.

Cammy climbed the last few inches of Vega and got ready to end the fight.

"Canon Spike!" Cammy shouted as she once more leaped into the air, delivering another spiral kick to Vega, this time hitting the giant directly in his face.

Time seemed to slow as Cammy's attack impacted Vega's head. A moment later, a cry was heard.

"Guh!" Came Vega's guttural cry as he fell to the ground, where he was knocked out cold, defeated by the 3 inch tall Cammy.

The shrunken fighter grinned as she saw her opponent fall. But this time, Cammy wasn't so lucky as to be able to land back on the desk, she fell to the floor along with Vega and...
13212221222221121121221.title: Vega's big defeat

choices: The capsule makes Cammy much weaker
The capsule makes Cammy smaller and weaker
132122212222211211212211.content:
Cammy landed safely and gracefully on top of her defeated opponent. Then, Vega started to move, throwing the tiny woman off balance. She worried he might still have some fight left in him. But he stay lying on the floor, knocked out. Cammy waited a moment and made sure Vega was really down for the count before getting off of him.

"The bigger they are..." Cammy mused as she jumped off of the giant's unconscious form.

On the floor, Cammy saw her earpiece and grapple hook gun not to far away. She ran over to her useful devices. She first tried the gun, but soon discovered that it wouldn't work no matter what she did, Vega had broken it in the fight. Next she put her earpiece on.

"It's Cammy. I took care of Vega." She spoke, and waited for a response. But she didn't get one. "Is anyone there? Over?" She asked. Again, no response. "Great." Cammy groaned, taking the earpiece out and throwing it away.

Both of her specially-made gadgets had been broken. She was now alone and without any helpful devices, just a tiny, 3 inch tall woman in the enemy's base. Cammy looked around, seeing Vega's unconscious body still just lying there. She grinned, thinking that while she may be small, she had managed to take out one of her worst enemies even with the incredible handicap. And she decided to continue with her mission and get that capsule.

Cammy rushed over to Vega's hand, where she expected to find the capsule, but his hand was closed. So she had to pry open his huge fingers to get it. But even that wasn't enough, as they'd just go back to their resting position when she dropped them. She could see the capsule inside though, and so she just knew she had to get it out of Vega's grasp.

Cammy quickly devised a different strategy. This time crouching down in front of the giant hand and lifting up the huge fingers with her whole 3 inch tall body, similar to how she'd lifted weights before. To her delight, it worked, and she simply reached in and pulled out the rather large capsule while keeping the weight above her held up with her other hand. Cammy panted and mustered up all her strength to throw the capsule out of Vega's grasp and onto the floor nearby.

Cammy jumped back and took a rest, breathing heavily, as Vega's hand closed in front of her.

"All this just to get something that'll make me weaker!" Cammy panted.

Once Cammy recovered a few minutes later, she went over to the weakening capsule. It was huge by her size, but she knew she didn't have to ingest the whole thing, only a little would do the trick. Or so she was told by her team before the mission started.

It took the tiny fighter a good amount of her strength to pull the capsule apart, it spilled its contents on the floor when she did. Cammy bent down and picked up a handful of the stuff. She took a moment to look at it, and to brace herself for what would come next.

This better not make me so weak I can't even move... Cammy thought grimly as sweat started to form on her brow. But she had to shake such thoughts from her mind, now or never, as it were. So before she could convince herself further that it was a bad idea, Cammy took the handful of the stuff and swallowed it.

Cammy felt the effects of it take hold immediately...
132122212222211211212211.title: Cammy's little win

choices: Bison takes off with Cammy in hand
Someone shows up to help just in time
1321222122222112112122112.content:
Cammy gasped as she saw the world grow around her. She knew then that she was shrinking again! A horrible side-effect of the capsule, that neither she nor her team could have predicted. The already tiny fighter got even tinier, reducing in size until she was only a single inch tall. Cammy was horrified by the transformation, by her point of view she had just lost two-thirds of what little height she had left!

To make matters worse, her well-defined muscles were reduced as well. Making the formally tightly toned woman look less like a fighter, and more like someone who'd never worked out a day in her life!

Cammy lamented the loss of the tiny amount of strength and size she had left, and the now even smaller woman felt like crying. But she held back when she heard the door to the lab slam shut. She shot up and looked behind her. Her heart sunk when she saw Bison standing there, eyeing her tinier form menacingly.

"Oh god, B-Bison!" She squeaked. In the back of mind she knew the mission was to trick Bison into using his psycho powers on her while in her weakened state, but looking at the giant now, Cammy wasn't sure it was going to work. Her mind panicked, and she ran.

"Ah, ah. Not this time, little mouse." Bison said. He used his psycho powers then, but not on Cammy, instead he used his strange teleportation move to appear right in front of the tiny woman. Cammy gulped, and quickly turned around to run the other way. But it was no use, Bison was too fast, he picked up the inch tall Cammy effortlessly.

"How nice of you to deliver yourself back to me. Cammy." Bison chuckled, looking Cammy's smaller form over in his hand. "You were always a disappointment. But now, I think you're better suited for being my personal little pet. A trophy, if you will."

Cammy growled at the giant, but this only amused Bison further. He took a step over Vega's unconscious body.

"I see you managed to defeat Vega. No matter, he served his purpose." Bison said, and then delivered a deft kick to his subordinate. "And he thought he could have you all for himself. Well, my little pet, you don't have to worry about that now." Bison laughed, and walked towards the door.

Cammy knew that however bad Vega was to her, he most likely wouldn't kill her. But Bison didn't seem to have any qualms about that, provided she stayed on his good side she hoped he wouldn't resort to it. But as Bison walked closer to the door, Cammy's hopes of escape got further away from her. She started to sniffle, she couldn't help herself, the thought of being the tiny slave of this madman was mortifying enough, and she was so close to having to live it...
1321222122222112112122112.title: Even smaller in front of her worst enemy

13212221222221121121221122.content:
Just as things looked the bleakest for Cammy, the door behind her and Bison opened! The door was burst open, and footsteps could be heard as someone stepped in the lab.

"Not so fast, Bison!" A male voice shouted.

"What's this?" Bison said, turning around to see.

Standing there was none other than Cammy's radio support, Delta Red's lead scientist himself! He was alone, but not without help. The scientist looked nervous as he held up his pistol, aimed at Bison.

"Let Cammy go!" He shouted, his hands shaking on his weapon.

"What are you doing here!?" Cammy squeaked, not sure if her voice could carry to her ally.

"Oh. A friend of yours?" Bison asked the tiny woman in his grip. Cammy was too shocked by this turn of events to reply, not that it mattered. "You want her? What are you going to do to get her?" Bison asked smugly, and took a step towards Cammy's friend.

"Stay back! I will shoot!" The scientist shouted, gripping his pistol tighter.

The scientist was afraid at this point in time, but he had to do something to save Cammy. After communications with her went down, he insisted on going in to save her, but the rest of the team told him to wait a little longer. Now, with his shrunken friend and Bison in his sights, he knew he made the right choice. But he was all alone, and there wasn't time to call for backup. He wondered what he could really do to save Cammy.

Cammy couldn't believe this was happening, but she was happy that her team hadn't given up on her yet, she hoped the scientist could pull it off.

Bison, meanwhile, wasn't taking the scientist's threats seriously though, and instead kept walking towards him slowly...
13212221222221121121221122.title: Not so fast Bison!

choices: Bison finsihes the scientist and grabs Cammy again

"You must see now that nobody can defeat me." Bison told him.

"Yeah? What about me!" Cammy squeaked. She was just inches, by her view, away from the stool now.

"Cammy!? What are you doing!?" Bison shouted, his eyes wide.

Cammy smirked and jumped on top of the psycho powered stool. Instantly she felt the psycho powers effect her body, and, much to her relief, she started to grow!

"Yes!" Cammy cheered as her body stretched higher and higher, until the british woman, and her signature costume, reached her normal height at last. "Yes!" She repeated, overjoyed to have her plan work, and to finally be returned to normal.

"How is this possible?!" Bison shouted, looking rather shocked by this turn of events.

Cammy grinned and turned to face her opponent.

"You didn't even know the extent of your powers? How pitiful." She said. "Let me show you mine!"

Cammy rushed Bison, and delivered blow after blow to the villain. Taken off guard for perhaps the first time in his life, Bison could do nothing to defend himself from Cammy's quick attacks. In no time at all, Bison was down.

"Yes! I beat Bison!" Cammy cheered.

"Y-You did it...!" She heard her scientist friend and ally say. Cammy turned around and saw the brutal damage Bison had done to him, she rushed to his aid.

"My god... I'm so sorry this happened to you." Cammy said softly.

"No.." The scientist coughed up a bit of blood. "I-It was worth it.." He sounded like he was going to say something more, but passed out from his wounds before he could.

---

It was a few days later in Delta Red's base, when things had finally calmed down. Cammy and the scientist were talking in his lab. Cammy sitting on a stool, and the scientist in a wheelchair.

"Well, Cammy. That was some week, huh?" The scientist asked. He had recovered from his wounds, thanks to Cammy's efforts, she had dragged his unconscious body out of the base by herself, normally she'd have just carried the man, but with the weakening capsule still affecting her, that was impossible.

"Ugh, don't remind me." Cammy groaned. "I just wanted to check up on you and see how you're doing. I don't need to be reminded of the time I was little more than a bug crawling on you!" Cammy laughed.

"Okay, okay. I'm fine, I'll have you know! The doctors tell me I'll be back on my feet in a few weeks." The scientist replied fast. He paused, and looked up at Cammy from his wheelchair. "You know, you're a lot more scary when you're big!"

"Oh, am I?" Cammy asked. She stood up to her full height, which after getting back to the base, she found out was actually 2 inches shorter than normal. Her lost height an effect of the weakening capsule. "I'm not as big as I used to be."

"I'm sorry. That can't be helped. But..." The scientist said, touching Cammy's arm, as if to examine it. "This can be."

"I know." Cammy sighed. Ever since she took the weakening capsule, it's effects hadn't worn off. Her team told her that she'd never get back her lost height, but that if she worked out like she had before she shrank, her muscles should return. So far, no progress there, but Cammy wasn't giving up. "I just wish that capsule didn't have permanent effects!"

"You can't stand being a little smaller?" The scientist asked.

"No! I don't like it!" Cammy replied with a pout. After a moment, she relented, and smiled at her ally. "But you know, I'm just glad we both made it out of there."

"Agreed."

Cammy then looked puzzled about something. "But I wonder, why didn't Bison know that his powers would counteract the weakening capsule and make me grow?"

"Well..." The scientist started with some hesitation. "We didn't really know if it would work either..."

"What!" Cammy shouted. "I lost two inches because of you! Not to mention my poor muscles!"

"Sorry. It was an educated guess though, if that makes you feel any better." The scientist replied meekly, shrinking into his wheelchair.

"OH, don't think you're getting off that easy!" Cammy shouted. She wasn't too upset though, things had worked out in the end after all, but she'd give her team hell for lying to her!

13322221211.content:
The day had not started exactly as planned for the three rebels Locke, Terra and Celes. During a mission to enter the mysterious Magitek Factory in the city of Vector they had all been captured by the Empire's soldiers and thrown into prison. Their friends would not know anything about it. Not wanting to wait for their punishment, the three desperately tried to come up with something in order to get out. Locke worked on the prison doors lock, without any result.

"It's no use" Locke said. "I need better tools to get this door open!"

"It's okay Locke, at least you tried!" said Terra with a sigh while comforting the thief and self-proclaimed treasure hunter.

Behind the two sat Celes on a bed. She had been observing Locke's efforts to get the door open. She got up and walked towards her two friends.

"What would you require to get the door open Locke?" said the blonde ex-general.

"Well, basically a lock pick, but the guards took that from me. This door lock have something similar to buttons, but without a tool to enter the keyhole, it's impossible.

"Then let me try something. I know a spell that might just do the trick!" Celes answered.

"By all means, be my guest!"

Celes went further back into the cell, away from her friends.

"Okay then, stand back. I need some space to perform this one..." Celes said. She closed her eyes and raised her hands towards her body with open palms. She began to concentrate and started to channel magic. Her hair began to blow in different directions, even though there was no wind. At first Locke and Terra had no idea what kind of spell it was that Celes was casting, but moments later it was obvious.

"Oh my god! Celes... you're shrinking!" Terra said in shock.
