1352222222222.content: What about Samus Aran from the Metroid series?
1352222222222.title: Metroid

13522222222221.content:
"WARNING! WARNING!" The starship's computer stated in a robotic voice. The warning sirens boomed through the ship, it was loud and annoying but it worked. Because slowly but surely, bounty hunter Samus Aran regained consciousness.

The bounty hunter's mind was foggy as she wondered what was going on. Slowly she opened her eyes to the familiar sight of her starship's dashboard. The room was bathed in a dark red light, the emergency light, Samus realized. On the ship's main screen she saw a timer ticking away, 58 minutes, or was it seconds? It was hard for her to make out with the pain in her head.

Instinctively she tried to rub her aching head hoping to relieve the pain, but when she did so it felt like a cold, metal thwack instead, which only increased her discomfort. Samus groaned. She looked over herself and saw that she was wearing her power suit, or rather, what was left of it, it was ripped apart in several spots and severely damaged in most of the others. She was missing major areas of the suit, such as her helmet, which explained the earlier thwack.

Recovering from her unfortunate self-inflicted hit, Samus tried to make sense of what was happening. Though, one thing she already knew was that the power suit was a lost cause at this point and she decided it would be easier just to remove it from her person. She'd have to fix it later, she thought. Pressing a button on her suit caused it to seemingly disappear, of course, she knew that if she wanted to get it back, all she had to do was press the button again. Now clad only in her zero suit, moving was much easier for the bounty hunter.
She took another look at the main screen. The timer she saw before still counted down, a little over 30 minutes left now.

Thirty minutes. Samus thought, That doesn't add up... Samus stared at the screen, it now read 28. She shook her head. Either two minutes had passed while she stared at the screen, or... Wait, this timer isn't running on minutes, it's seconds! Samus realized at last, she'd have recognized it sooner, but with her pulsing headache it was hard to even think. She thought about what this meant, and she wasn't completely sure but, if her history with timers was anything to go by that meant the starship was going to explode in about half a minute!

Adreneline coursed through her veins at this sudden realization, Samus jolted out of the pilot's seat she was in and out the room. With her unmatched athleticism she quickly reached an emergency escape pod. She got inside and pressed a large button, launching herself to freedom. The pod shot up into the air at the proper angle and almost just as quickly flew back down to the planet.

The escape pod landed with a loud thud. Inside, though, the ride was smooth as could be and Samus barely felt a thing. The door opened automatically. Stepping out Samus finally got a look at the planet she was currently on. A lush, green valley, not unlike the landing site of one of her previous adventures, Tallon IV, with some differences of course. Namely the towering forest that surrounded the exit of the valley.

Samus took some time for herself to recover, her head still felt horrible, she felt like she might pass out at any moment. When all of a sudden...
13522222222221.title: Crash landing on a strange planet

choices: Samus finds an "upgrade" in the forest
Samus comes across an alien lifeform
135222222222211.content:
Samus did her best to ignore the pain in her head, and instead surveyed her surroundings. When suddenly, she got the strangest feeling of deja vu. Looking at the planet it all came back to her.

The planet was S1Z3, a planet that was largely covered in vegetation but mostly devoid of life. But it was actually perfectly inhabitable by most species, including humans, due to the fresh air, drinkable water and many edible foods. She remembered now, seeing it all in the debriefing files she received after accepting this mission. And while she appreciated those facts, she hadn't come here to vacation.

She had come in response to a distress signal sent by a human research crew, who were on site studying local plant-life. A safe task if there ever was one, Samus had thought at the time, so why would they need to send a distress signal at all? That added to the fact that the first responders who went to help never reported back was enough to get her attention.
So she set off to find out what was going on down there. But as soon as she entered to planet's atmosphere her ship started to malfunction she lost control of it and, realizing that she was going to crash, she quickly donned her power suit and braced for impact. But had been tossed about so violently inside her own ship that she was knocked out momentarily. Which all led up to how she ended up here, stuck wearing just her zero suit.

*BOOM*

An explosion nearby pulled Samus away from her thoughts. She quickly took cover behind a nearby rock, waiting a few moments before poking her head out to see what just happened, she found that the cause of the explosion was her own starship. She sighed and came out from behind her cover. She examined what was left of her ship and found that the internal damage was too severe, there was no way it was going to fly without extensive repairs. The starship was equipped with a self-repair mechanism, so she wasn't too worried about it. But with it's current state the repairs could take days, possibly even an entire week before completing.

Samus sighed.

She knew there was no point in standing around and waiting. She had a mission to do after all. Finding the research crew and the rescue crew were top priority right now. And if she were lucky, they might have a working space craft of their own. One they just haven't used to escape the planet yet for whatever reason. Samus wanted that to be true but luck hasn't exactly been on her side since she arrived.

Turning her thoughts back to the facts of her more immediate situation, Samus thought to do a quick self-exam.
No major injuries on her body, just one mild headache that was steadily getting weaker. No tears on her zero suit. Her stun gun was in it's holster on her waist, she checked it for damage and found nothing wrong. But not everything worked though, her map and HUD weren't responding at all. She walked up to her starship and tapped on the side of it, opening a "hidden" emergency supply compartment which held some medical supplies, small weapons and a few other helpful items. Samus took what she thought she needed and placed it all neatly in a decently sized bag which she then tied around her waist.

With everything ready, Samus set off into the forest to find the research crew...
135222222222211.title: Samus recalls her mission to S1Z3

choices: Continue towards the base. She hade survived worse.
Go back to the ship and make a thorough examination of herself.
1352222222222112.content:
Samus moved quickly and gracefully through the forest. She was agile and dodged obstacles with ease. Her first priority was to scout her surroundings and figure out exactly where she was. S1Z3 was not really a hostile planet compared to others in this and neighbouring solar system, but it was still home to several dangerous life-forms.

Luckily enough it seemed that Samus' ship had brought her to the right coordinates. After climbing a tree, the bounty hunter saw something resembling a base camp a couple of miles away. She returned to the ground and immediately started heading in the base's direction.

Being without her power suit was not something that bothered Samus. She was not only a skilled warrior, but also an enhanced human with Chozo DNA, capable of wonders. The suit however, would have protected her from what would come next. As Samus approached the perimeter of the base, she quietly took cover behind some rocks on high ground. It was not the best spot in terms of camouflage. The zero suit was basically a beacon of attention, but she needed information of the area. Her headache was gone, and without making much noise she carefully removed a pair of binoculars from her backpack.

She looked through the binoculars. There was no movement at the base. No movement at all. Almost like the place was empty. After assessing the situation Samus felt that the best option was to go down to the base and check all the houses. Perhaps they were sleeping, but something felt amiss. As Samus was about to move, she suddenly discovered an alien life-form close to her feet. Samus had never seen anything like it. The creature resembled something of a forest spirit, or the monkey-like Etecoons living on the planet Zebes. The little being just stood there, looking at Samus with huge eyes.

Samus didn't want to scare it. However, she had to leave this place before someone discovered her. She moved slowly in order to get up on her feet. The creature appeared to be quite friendly, not scared at all, and curiously moved towards Samus's backpack. Samus was not amused by this and and moved her hand towards the animal to make it go away.

"Sorry little guy, I need tha.."

Samus was suddenly interrupted. As soon as she moved her hand close enough to the animal it let out a scream and released a pink gas at her and then quickly ran away as fast as it could. Samus started coughing, and for a second she feared for her life. After a couple of seconds however, the coughing stopped. Besides a small tingling and almost comfortable sensation she felt just fine. Then again, she knew nothing about the alien and the gas it had released on her.

Samus decided to...
1352222222222112.title: A cute, but dangerous alien

choices: She heard something coming from outside!
13522222222221121.content:
At first, Samus thought about returning to her ship and make a thorough examination of herself. When she felt no real change in her body she changed her mind and decided to continue with the mission. Her physical condition and immune system were both far more superior than any other human, and whatever she had inhaled it seemed fine. Perhaps the gas wasn't so toxic after all.

Samus put the binoculars back in her backpack and left her hiding spot. She had decided to go down to the base and investigate it more closely. She readied herself for combat by removing her stun gun from its holster, and then started to run swiftly through the terrain. Once again, Samus moved with grace. Being without her power suit made her quicker than usual and it kind of suited her mission well.

As Samus got down to the base she decided to start investigating one of the barracks within the perimeter. The barracks was almost as big as a truck and had most likely been dropped there by a larger spaceship. It appeared to be something of a research facility. Inside it looked like a combined office and laboratory.

"Hello? Anyone here?" Samus asked while securing the perimeter. She got no response. The place really was empty.

Samus started to search the barracks for any kind of information regarding what had happened here. She was still on high alert and prepared for anything. Well, almost anything.

"A-aah..!"

It came from nowhere. Suddenly, Samus felt the odd tingling sensation from before return to her body. It swirled through her from high to low. The feeling was so intense that she was forced to lean against a table. She moaned quietly and tried to endure it. It lasted only a short moment before disappearing again. The blond bounty hunter was in shock.

"What just... happened?"

Samus felt dizzy and raised her head. Something felt different, somehow. She looked around.

"Did the room just... grow?" Samus thought. No, it couldn't have. Was this an illusion? Was it the gas? While thinking about it, Samus noticed her stun gun. It was both bigger and heavier than before. It wasn't the room that had gone bigger. It was Samus who had shrunk several inches.

Samus gasped and felt uneasy. She had never experienced anything like this before. She quickly regained her composure however, and tried to focus on the situation at hand. It was a good thing she did, because suddenly...
13522222222221121.title: Onwards to the base

choices: Samus searches the base for a solution
Samus hears something moving in the room
135222222222211211.content:
Samus leaned against the table. Her focus was back, but she still couldn't think. It was an odd feeling to suddenly shrink, she found that she couldn't shake really it, it was like a bad cold or something, it stuck with her. But she soon found the reason for that.

"A-Agh..!" She winced.

The tingling sensation came back, she felt it all over her body once again. This time though, the jolt that coursed her body felt stronger. It was enough to knock the accomplished bounty hunter to her feet, knocking the table she leaned on over in the process.
Samus groaned when she hit the floor, and she shivered from the jolt for just another moment before the feeling subsided.

"Damn..!" She cursed before getting back to her feet. Without really thinking about it, she also pulled up the table that she had knocked over by accident. When it was up, she noticed that it looked strange somehow, like it was bigger. Samus gasped when she realized it. "I... I am shrinking..." She said, thinking out loud. Which was odd for her, but then again, this was an odd situation.

The shrinking had happened to her again. She was even shorter now. She hadn't been completely sure about it before, but it was now easy for her to see that she had indeed shrunk. Several more inches had vanished from her height, just like that. She dreaded to think what might happen to her if this kept up, would she disappear entirely, shrinking into nothing? She cleared those dark thoughts from her mind, thinking about such things would do her no good.
She could still feel it inside her, whatever was causing this had stuck with her since her first bout of shrinking.

A virus? She wondered about the cause. She tried to think about how this was happening to her, and she remembered that little alien creature she encountered just minutes ago, and the gas it sprayed her with. Could it be..?

Before Samus could think about it anymore, she felt the familiar tingling sensation building up again.

"No! Ah, uugh..!" She moaned.

Samus started to shake again. The strong, coursing sensation was just like before. But this time she took precaution, taking a seat in the chair next to the table before she fell over again. Reeling in pain in the chair, she managed to keep her eyes open and she could see it happen this time. The world grew around her slightly as she lost even more height. When the shrinking was over, mere seconds later, the intense tingling passed.

At this point, Samus knew she had to do something and fast! Otherwise she was just going to keep shrinking away. She had lost too much height already, she didn't know for sure how much, but she couldn't risk losing any more.

Next...
135222222222211211.title: Samus expriences shrinking seizures

choices: "My size doesn't matter. I will handle this... alone!"
"Listen Claire, I need you to help me..."
1352222222222112112.content:
As she was sitting in the chair, Samus realized she couldn't feel the floor anymore. Her legs were too short to reach it due to the shrinking. She noticed a mirror and could clearly see in its reflection that she was the size of a child now, and this made her really worried. She was a very capable woman, but this was beyond her control and something that would most likely not go away anytime soon.

Damn it, this is bad! the bounty hunter thought to herself. My mission will be over soon if this continues!

Suddenly, Samus heard noises. It sounded like items falling to the floor followed by a gasp. She immediately grabbed her stun gun and aimed it at what she thought was the source – a nearby closet. The stun gun was awfully heavy and Samus was forced to hold it with both hands in order to keep a steady aim.

"I know you're in there. If you're not an alien, show yourself!"

Silence fell over the room and soon the closet started to open slowly. Out came an elegant young woman, looking mighty scared. She appeared to be a scientist, or perhaps some sort of researcher. She wore a classic white lab coat together with an aqua-colored top and something that appeared to be either shorts or a skirt. Her hair was almost the opposite of Samus - brown and kind of short, ending around her neck.

"I-I'm unarmed. Please don't shoot me!" the girl said with horror in her voice. It was obvious she was scared.

"Ok, listen. I..." Samus started, but was once again interrupted by another powerful shrinking seizure. Samus did everything to focus, but the more she tried the more pain she felt. The feeling was too intense for her. The stun gun soon became too heavy for her and she was forced to drop it. The scientist girl was quick to notice this and immediately ran towards the table and grabbed it. With shaky hands she aimed it at Samus, who now was only 20 inches tall.

"W-who are you and what are you doing in this laboratory? Answer me!" The girl said nervously.

"I'm not your enemy. My name is Samus and I'm a bounty hunter. I got your distress call, but I ended up crashing with my ship. I... a-aah!"

Samus felt another seizure, and she was sweating now. She managed to remain calm, but spoke fast as she tried to endure it.

"Please... I don't know what's going on... help me!"

The girl hesitated, but as soon as she made her decision she acted with haste. She dropped the gun and quickly went to a cabinet to grab a small canister. When she returned to Samus, the young scientist sprayed the bounty hunter with some sort of gas. Whatever it was it felt really good.

"There. This should halt the shrinking for the time being, or at least slow it down." the girl said, now with acting as she was a lot more calm.

"You've been inflicted with a poisonous gas from the gindyni. You will need to take some medicine at specific intervals for the shrinking to completely stop, but you should be alright. I'm Claire by the way. Are you sure you are a bounty hunter?"

"Yes. It may not look like it but I am. And thank you for stopping it. Tell me Claire, what happened here?" Samus asked, trying to ignore her new size, which was probably around 12 inches. The girl was already a giant.

The question made Claire uneasy, but soon she started explain. She was the daughter of two scientists that was part of a team of researchers and bio chemists. They had come to S1Z3 in order to study its unique plant-life for the benefit of mankind. During their stay they had made some amazing discoveries, which had all been reported to their superiors off-planet. However, the transmission had been intercepted by space-pirates, and soon thereafter the pirates had attacked the small colony and captured the scientists.

"I managed to hide in that closet and was too afraid to come out until you appeared." Claire said, trying to hold back her tears. "Samus... what should we do? You might be a bounty hunter, but you can't do anything in that size!"
1352222222222112112.title: A girl in the closet

choices: Understanding. Still worried, but she'd trust Samus to help.
Unconvinced. For Samus's 'safety', Claire keeps her with there by force.
13522222222221121121.content:
"Hmm..." Samus mused over Claire's words. She took a moment to stop and take a good look around the room. The last few minutes were so frantic for the tiny bounty hunter that her ever diminishing size hadn't really caught up to her yet. As such, looking at the room now was a huge shock to her, she still had her never-give-up bounty hunter instincts well intact, but seeing the room and everything in it, especially Claire who now looked like a giantess to her, made Samus finally realize how small she truly was, and how helpless she could be.

"You see?" Claire asked, seeing the shrunken woman's reaction. "It's not safe.."

In her head, Samus agreed that it would not be safe. But when was any mission of hers ever safe anyway, she rationalized to herself. "No." She said in a confident voice that surprised Claire. "My size doesn't matter. I will handle this... alone!"

"You can't be serious!" Claire exclaimed, genuinely worried for Samus' safety if she were to go out at her size.

"I am." Samus shot back with a determined look on her face, but eased up a second later. "Look, I can't just stay here with you and do nothing. Thank you for worrying, but I'll be fine."

Claire shook her head. "No, you won't." She said. "There's something I haven't explained to you about this place yet."

"What?"

"This planet, S1Z3." Claire chuckled. "Heh, that name must be some kinda joke or something." Samus wasn't amused, looking like she didn't understand what was so funny about it. "S1Z3." Claire repeated to her. "You know what it looks like written down?"

"Size." Samus answered, finally getting it.

"That's right." Claire said. "Size. I don't know what it is about this place but the creatures here, although there aren't many, all seem to have various abilities to change the size of things."

"Like the Gindyni from before?" Samus asked.

"Yes." Claire answered. "Although our research has found that most of the animals native to this planet are immune to the effects of size change, the plants are not. Which explained why they were so unique, we thought it was something in their nature or the soil around here that caused them to grow so quickly, but as it turned out it was the creatures living here that were the cause."

"Growing and shrinking food?" Samus asked curiously.

"You catch on quick." Claire said, sounding a little more relaxed now.

"Thanks, but-" Samus started to say, but she suddenly felt another shrinking seizure coming on. But this one was different, much smaller and less effective. She shrank an inch after it was over, leaving her at a tiny 11 inches tall. "Not again!" She complained.

"Oh, sorry." Clarie said, reaching for the spray she had used earlier. "Like I said, you need to take this at certain intervals to completely stop the shrinking."

Claire sprayed Samus with the medicine again, and the tiny bounty hunter's shrinking seemed to slow to a halt.

"Was that enough to stop it?" She asked.

"Unfortunately not." Claire explained. She put the canister of medicine on a nearby table and sat down in a chair. "It'll take a lot more than that to completely cure you. In fact, you're still shrinking even now, but at such a slow rate it's hardly noticeable. Well, actually, I can't see it since you're so small and shrinking so slow, but can you see it happening before you?"

Samus paused for a moment to be sure. She could just barely notice everything around her growing larger.

"Yes, but just barely." Samus said.

"I see." Clarie said.

"Look, Claire." Samus said, returning to her confident and commanding tone. "Thanks again for all the help. But I really must be going now. The space pirates might be planning their escape already, and there's no time to wait around here so I can take the cure. Besides, with all that you've told me I think I'll be fine if you just let me have that little canister, I think I can handle that." At that, Claire nodded. It seemed a fair enough point to let her have it. But she still wasn't convinced that it would be safe, she told Samus as such again, and the bounty hunter replied, "Don't let my *cough* reduced size make you think I'm helpless."

"But Samus, please-" Claire was cut off again by Samus.

"Trust me. I've been in worse situations than this before." Samus said. Although she knew it wasn't really true, she knew she had to convince Claire somehow. "I'll find the pirates and rescue the research crew. Really. I'm telling you it'll be fine!"

Claire's response...
13522222222221121121.title: Shrunken Samus goes it on her own... But first!

choices: Samus encounters a space pirate duo, they had come back!
Samus makes it out of the research base with relative ease
135222222222211211211.content:
"I understand, Samus." Claire said. "But I just wanted to tell you about this."

Claire reached into her coat's pocket and pulled something out, she held up what appeared to be a set of small earpieces. She handed one to Samus.

"Communicators?" Samus asked, examining the tiny thing in her hand, it was small even to her.

"Well, yes." Claire said. "We can talk to each other over these."

"Thanks." Samus said, placing one into her ear. "How'd you get them so small?"

"Ha ha, that's the normal size for them." Claire explained, she showed Samus the one in her hand, it was the same size as the one in Samus' ear. "See?" Claire put the earpiece in her ear. "They're more like microchips for, um, regular sized people. But I guess it's like an earpiece to you."

"Yeah, how bizarre." Samus said. Thinking about how odd her reduced size made things seem.

"Anyway, here's the spray." Claire handed Samus the little canister.

Samus took the small canister with ease, putting into her stun gun's holster, which, unlike her stun gun, thankfully had shrunk with her. It fit rather well in there. Samus taught it much better to keep it there for quick and easy access, in case she started shrinking faster again, she could pull it out and apply it much faster than if it were inside her supply bag, which had also shrunk with her.

"Thank you, Claire." Samus said. "You've been a big help."

Claire giggled at that little size pun. Samus didn't quite catch on though, and just started at the larger girl quizzically.

"It's no problem, Samus. You say you've come here to help us, so the least I can do is give you a little help." Claire said, keeping up the size related puns.

"Um, right." Samus said flatly. "I'll be going now if there's nothing else?"

"Oh yes!" Claire exclaimed as if she'd just remembered something important. "The pirates base! I think I have a way to find it."

"Really!?" Samus asked, surprised.

"Yes! Wait a second, please." Claire got up from her chair and hurried to find something in the back of the room. When she returned she was holding another device, this one looking like a circular tracking device. She handed it to Samus. "Our research crew always wear tracking devices in case one of us gets lost. This device lets us find them. And this is one of our smaller models. Oh, and since they were captured..."

"I get it." Samus said, not looking away from the screen. "If the pirates took them to their base, this should help us find it easily..!" She looked up, and up, to Claire. "This will make things much easier. Thank you again, Claire, I'm glad I found you."

"Your welcome." Claire said, with a slight blush at the compliment. She hadn't known Samus long, but she already felt like she'd made a good friend in her.

Samus put the tracker into her bag. With everything finally set for her big journey, Samus tied up the bag. She looked up at Claire and smiled, giving her a thumbs up.

"Good luck." Claire said.

"Thanks. Keep yourself hidden, in case any more pirates come back here." Samus said.

Claire nodded. She went back to the closet she had been hiding in when Samus first arrived, took a last look at the diminutive bounty hunter, and stepped inside and closed the door.

Samus watched until she was sure Claire was safely hidden away in the closet. She turned to leave, when she saw her stun gun laying on the floor, she lamented the loss of her only weapon, but continued on. She got up and left the barracks, at last setting off to find the captured research crew.
135222222222211211211.title: Claire's gifts to Samus

choices: Head back to the science base, maybe this is what happened o the researchers
Make camp around her suit, hopefully this is temporary
13522222222221122.content:
Backtracking her way to her ship, Samus went at a slightly hurried pace, not knowing what effects that gas would have on her, she just hoped that the medical equipment survived the explosion. As she stepped over a log, she noticed that her zero suit was a bit baggy, odd.

"Wait." She said as she looked at herself, her suit growing larger with each passing minute, "I'm shrinking?!" She screeched.

Running as fast as she could despite the increasing bagginess of her suit, and the decreasing length of her legs, she tried to get to her ship before she shrunk too much more. Until she tripped. Stunned for a moment, she stood up, and watched as her zero suit slid right off her, standing naked in the woods, Samus froze in shock before her mind caught up to what was happening, and she started off again, dwindling as she went.

By now the naked blonde bounty huntress noticed that most of the grass was taller than her, and that she couldn't tell where she was headed anymore. Deciding to cut her loses, she headed back to her empty zero suit and measured herself out alongside the fingers. Two inches, that's what the most dangerous bounty huntress in the universe had been reduced to.

"Don't panic, don't panic, don't panic!" She chanted to herself, trying to stay calm, but failed, and she crawled into the resort suit for shelter before having a good cry at her situation. She couldn't find her way back to her ship right now, she couldn't use any of her weapons, and she was on a alien world.

After she managed to get resell back under control, she decided to ...
13522222222221122.title: Go back to the ship and make a thorough examina...

13522222222222221.content: Will Peach be the unlucky girl to be shrunk?
13522222222222221.title: Peach?

135222222222222211.content:
On the pathway outside of the massive castle in the center of Toad Town, capital of the land known as the Mushroom Kingdom, Princess Peach, the kind, noble, and beautiful monarch of the kingdom, along with her best friend and fellow ruler Princess Daisy, princess of the kingdom of Sarasaland, walked back toward the castle, having just finished playing a game of tennis on the castle's official court and were heading inside to rest and change out of their sports clothes.

"That was some game, Daisy! I never would've guessed you'd come back after all those shots you gave me. I was even beginning to think you were just someone in disguise trying to sneak into the castle" Peach complemented.

"I keep telling you," Daisy replied, a slight agitation in her voice. "I was just off my game until then. I've told you before that true competitive side doesn't show on the off season."

"You've really gotta give me some pointers some time," the pink princess continued. "Especially how you pick up on where the ball's going to be before I even hit it! That would definitely help me during the tournament!"

"It's just in my blood," Daisy explained. "And it's also something I'll take to my grave!"

Both girls continued their conversation as they walked back to Peach's castle. Back inside, they continued to talk while a Toad servant handed them each a glass of lemonade. The conversation ended when Peach reached her room, the princess entering her chamber while Daisy went on to her guest room.

Inside her room, Peach entered the bathroom, carrying some fresh undergarments and one of her signature dresses. She removed her sweaty clothing and entered the shower to freshen herself up. A few minutes later, Peach emerged, entirely clean. She then put on her fresh clothes, applied some more makeup, and exited the bathroom, ready to get on with her day. However, she then noticed on the nightstand next to her soft, pink-sheeted bed a tray with a mushroom on it. It looked like a normal mushroom, but had a green cap with pink spots.

"Hm... Never seen this type of mushroom before... Well, I am hungry after that, so I guess this'll have to do..."

Reluctantly, she bit into the mushroom. However, immediately after taking the first bite, she was overjoyed by the taste.

I've never tasted anything so good in my life! Peach thought, as she bit took another bite out of the mushroom. Seconds later, she noticed that it had entirely disappeared from her hands.

Wow... I don't think I've ever eaten so fast in my life either... She thought, somewhat embarrassed that she had devoured the strange mushroom like wolf to meat. Well, at least nobody saw me...

Peach then began to advance toward her door, but immediately noticed something was wrong when the walls suddenly began moving upward.

"Huh?" she asked herself, as she looked down and the ground was suddenly moving closer. She then looked toward the nightstand, and saw that it was increasing in size. At this point, her head was about at it's level

"I'm shrinking!" Peach shockingly cried out, as she continued to decrease in size. A few seconds later, Peach was a mere inch tall in height; just about the size of a chess piece. However, as soon as she was over the shock, she looked in wonder at her surroundings; everything was much bigger then it had been before; her bed and nightstand appeared to be skyscrapers compared to her.

However, she was brought out of her trance by a sudden knock at the door, followed by a voice saying, "You done in there, Peach?"

Daisy! But can I really let her see me while I'm like this? Peach thought out in worry. I could attempt to crawl under the door and sneak out... but also risk being squashed... but the same thing could happen anyway if Daisy came in here... However, after a few more seconds of thought, Peach finally made her decision:
135222222222222211.title: Puny Princess Peach

choices: Try to alert Daisy of her presence.
Move on and find someone else.
1352222222222222111.content:
The shrunken Princess Peach immediately ran toward her bedroom door. About half a minute later, she stood in front of the massive entryway. Standing about twenty feet (from her height) away from the door, looked down at the space underneath the door, and began to wonder if her plan would even work.

She asked herself, Am I even small enough to be able to squeeze under there? And what if Daisy notices me when I leave? Would she recognize me at this height? In fact, would anyone else recognize me? The thoughts crept into her mind one by one, and Peach began to doubt that she could survive in a gigantic world. However, her thoughts were interrupted by another bang on the door from Daisy.

"Hey! Peach! Are you dressed yet or not!? C'mon, answer me already!?"

"Whoa!" Peach fell over onto her rear in shock and fear, surprised not by the knock itself but by how loud and impatient Daisy's tone was, especially at her current height. She grabbed her crown, which had fallen off her head when she fell over, and placed it back on top of her thick blond hair. The tiny princess then stood up, walked the rest of the distance to the door, fell onto her stomach, and began to crawl under the gap between the door and the ground.

Hopefully Daisy won't barge in while I'm under here... Peach thought, her heart racing with each moment. Finally, she emerged from underneath the doorway and stood in the halls of her castle. She immediately stood up and smoothed her dress; however, when she glanced upward she was greeted by a wall of orange. The shrunken princess looked upward, and her eyes widened in shock when she saw how massive Princess Daisy was compared to her now. Currently wearing her usual princess attire, Daisy was about the size of a skyscraper from Peach's perspective. Her arms were folded over her chest, and her face showed her impatience. Daisy stood about four feet away from the door.

After a few seconds, the princess in orange finally lost her patience. She took one step forward, and banged on the door.

"That's it!" she yelled. "I'm coming in there whether you're done or not!" Daisy then grabbed the doorknob and thrust the door open. Upon first glance, she saw that the room was unoccupied.

"Peach? Are you in there?" she asked, taking another step forward and peering inside her bedroom. However, her foot was directly where Peach was!

On the ground, the shrunken princess cowered and fell over onto her back again, shrieking as Daisy's foot descended from above her. Peach shut her eyes and braced herself for the worst as the heeled shoe came down over her. If it has to end, at least it was Daisy... she told herself.

However, after a few seconds, nothing happened.

"Huh? I'm not a Peach pancake?" she asked herself, opening her eyes and noticing not only that she was still alive but that there wasn't a giant foot smearing her tiny, delicate form against the ground underneath it. She then looked up, and was once again surprised by what she saw: She was under Daisy's heeled shoe, but the arc of the shoe was over her instead of the sole or heel.

The princess let out a sigh of relief. "Way too close..." she said. She then watched as Daisy entered the room to check for her presence. Peach stood up and smoothed her dress once more. "My first few couple of minutes shrunk and I'm almost stepped on..." she told herself. "But now that that's behind me, what should I do now...?"
1352222222222222111.title: Leave the Room

135222222222222212.content: How about shrinking Princess Daisy down to size?
135222222222222212.title: Daisy

choices: She had tripped over her now oversized dress!
She had tripped over a pebble, and her clothes shrunk with her
13522222222222221221.content:
Rosalina was enjoying a day with her friends in the Mushroom Kingdom. The cosmic princess was having fun playing tennis, racing karts and doing all sorts of things with Mario and the gang. After the last match of tennis against Princess Daisy, in which Rosalina was the victor, she decided to take a rest for awhile. She found a nice spot under a tree nearby where she could sit and rest. Her star-shaped friend, Luma, followed and hovered beside her, holding a stone he found behind his back.

"Ahh, it's quite nice here. Are you having fun, Luma?" Rosalina asked the star child.

"Oh yes, Mama!" Luma exclaimed, but then looked distressed. "But I'm worried about the others on the observatory!"

"There's no need to be worried." Rosalina said, patting him. "We've only been gone for a few hours, I'm sure they can manage on their own for a while longer."

"Yes, but still..." Luma said, he wasn't used to being away from home for so long.

"Hmm... Okay, Luma." Rosalina started. "Why don't you go and check on them for me?"

"Are you sure, Mama? You'll be all alone!" Luma asked.

"I'll be fine, I've got Mario and the others here with me." Rosalina said with a reassuring smile. "Now, go on."

"Okay, Mama! You can count on me!" Luma said, giving Rosalina a salute. "I'll be back soon!"

And with that, Luma floated off. Rosalina watched the young star go, keeping a watchful eye on him as long as she could, he seemed to get smaller and smaller as he flew away from her. When she could no longer see him anymore, her attention turned back to the tennis court, where she saw that a match between Yoshi and Toad was going on.

Rosalina watched the match for a while before she noticed something on the ground. A glowing yellow stone, it was about the size of a tennis ball and at first that's what Rosalina thought it was, but it's ominous glow and star pattern made her think otherwise.

"Did Luma leave this here?" Rosalina wondered, she did see him trying to hide something behind his back. But she was intrigued by it, and she reached down and picked up the mysterious object. She felt a strange energy emanating from the stone as she held it. "I wonder if someone here knows what this is?"

Just was she was about to get up and ask, she suddenly felt very weak and tired and in a moment, she collapsed!

When she awoke sometime later, Rosalina found herself in an area surrounded by large trees, which looked more like huge blades of grass to the cosmic princess. She thought it was odd, but what really made her think was the huge stone next to her, with it's familiar yellow glow and star pattern, she thought it was the same stone she had held in her hand earlier. The only difference was that it was now almost as big as she was!

"Is that the same stone from before? But it's so much bigger now." Rosalina wondered, then had a sudden realization. "Oh no, could it be..?"

Fearing the worst, Rosalina stood up and saw that everything really was bigger, and she immediately knew what had happened.

"I've shrunk." Rosalina said in her usual monotone.

She had experienced shrinking before, when she helped Mario and his friends rescue the sprixies from Bowser, but she had never gotten this small. Comparing herself to the stone that shrunk her, She estimated herself to be about 6 inches tall.

"I need to get some help." Rosalina said aloud.

Rosalina set off to find somebody to help her get back to normal size, but she didn't get very far before she tripped and almost fell over, she then looked down and saw...
13522222222222221221.title: Rosalina shrinks

135222222222222212211.content:
Rosalina was standing on her now giant sized dress and was completely nude! She kept her calm demeanor up, but really, she was quite worried about her situation. Despite this, she didn't attempt to cover herself, not that there was anyone around to see her tiny, nude body anyways.

Thinking that her magic just might be able to help her right about now, Rosalina walked over to her wand, which had fallen from her hand when she shrunk and was now lying on the grass. As she had expected, it hadn't shrunk, and the magic tool could now tower over her, if it was upright, that is. But as it was lying flat on the ground Rosalina, even at her shrunken size, could still easily grasp her hand around the wand.

She grabbed the base of the wand and focused, trying to cast her magic, any magic that could help her. She had hoped the she might be able to use it to grow herself back, as she's grown to giant sizes with it before. Or maybe just make another, much smaller, dress appear so she wouldn't be so exposed. But to her dismay, nothing she tried worked. It was as if all its magic had been drained, as it was, the wand was now basically just another stick.

"So, my clothes don't fit me, and my magic isn't working. Hmm..." Rosalina thought about how she could get out of this mess. "If only I hadn't sent Luma away, he could get the others to..." Rosalina sighed. She knew it was pointless to worry about the past, right now she was shrunk and naked. She'd have to resort to her original plan, she needed someone to help her.

Luckily for the cosmic princess, she didn't have to wait long, as she heard footsteps approaching her location. Instinctively, she quickly crawled under her dress and hid. Poking her little head out she saw that the person who was coming was...
135222222222222212211.title: Magic won't help you

choices: The glowing stone! Peach begins to shrink!
A jar!? Peach's worried expression turns into a devious smile
1352222222222222122111.content:
Rosalina recognized the person as none other than Princess Peach, the ruler of the Mushroom Kingdom, and her close friend. Rosalina sighed in relief that it was her and not some unscrupulous character like Bowser. She thought that Peach would definitely help her, but knew that she'd need to get her attention first.

Peach was on a walk when she saw a discarded blue dress near a tree, she immediately thought it was Rosalina's dress, but now that she was closer, Peach didn't see any sign of her. Although she did see a strange glowing stone near the dress, she bent down to examine it.

Rosalina ditched her cover from the dress and ran, really more of a fast walk for her, towards the princess. She saw that Peach was looking at the mysterious stone that Rosalina knew must've been what shrunk her, and now the same thing was about to happen to Peach if she didn't act fast.

Peach examined the strange-looking stone some more, taking note of its unique star patterns and low glow. She reached down to grab it, when she saw something crawl by. She looked at this new creature a bit more carefully and noticed it looked very much like a tiny little woman, it was waving its little arms up and down and it even seemed to be squeaking at her.

"Peach, no!" Rosalina shouted. "Don't touch that stone!"

Rosalina then saw Peach's huge hand sweep her up and bring her up to the latter's face.

"Oh my goodness!" Peach exclaimed. "Is that you, Rosalina!?"

"Yes, Peach. I've been shrunken and I need your help." Rosalina says, her calm voice returning.

Rosalina thought she could relax now that she had stopped Peach from shrinking herself, but then she saw what was in her other hand...
1352222222222222122111.title: Peach to the rescue?

choices: She tells her that they need to find someone to help them
She tells her that she doesn't know what to do
13522222222222221221111.content:
"Peach, drop that stone!" Rosalina tries to warn her giant friend. It was too late, though, as Rosalina could already feel Peach's grip on her loosen as she starts to shrink.

"What? This?" Peach absentmindedly asks, looking at the stone. "Huh? Is it getting bigger?" Peach looks back at Rosalina. "You're getting bigger to!"

"You're shrinking, princess." Rosalina sighs, shaking her head at the slow-minded princess.

"WHAT!?" Peach shouts. She quickly throws the stone to the ground, hoping that would stop her shrinking, but when it doesn't she really starts to panic. Flailing her arms around and looking every which way for somebody to help her. She holds Rosalina close to her face and asks, "I'm not going to get as small as you, am I!?"

"I don't know." Rosalina softly replies, rubbing her head, Peach's frantic flailing before made her quite dizzy. "But could you please put me down?"

Peach nods and bends down to the ground, lowering her hand where the 6 inch Rosalina hops off. When suddenly, Peach passes out and falls over, landing softly in the grass. She lands just inches away from the other shrunken woman, who gets blown back a bit by the bigger woman's shockwaves.

"I thought she'd pass out. Just like I did before shrinking..." Rosalina thinks. "Good thing I had her put me down before she did..."

Rosalina watches as Peach seems to get swallowed up by her dress as she shrinks into it. Peach's shrinking form gets smaller and smaller until finally she's just a little lump inside of her dress. Rosalina stares at her for awhile, unsure of what to do. When all of a sudden she hears Peach scream from inside her own dress.

Shortly after, Peach emerges, crawling out from under her dress, and now completely naked. When she sees Rosalina staring at her, she lets out a loud yelp and quickly covers herself as best she can with her hands.

"Rosie! We're tiny!" Peach shouts.

"I know." Rosalina says in monotone.

"I-I've never been so, so small!" Peach cries. "This'll wear off soon, right?"

"I don't know." Rosalina replies.

"How can you be so calm!?" Peach asks. "What are we going to do?!"

"Hmm..." Rosalina thinks for a moment. Peach was looking to her for answers, but Rosalina wasn't really sure how they should proceed. And although she doesn't show it, Rosalina was almost as worried as Peach was, she just had a more leveled head. She tried to think, she needed a plan...
13522222222222221221111.title: Two tiny princesses

135222222222222212211111.content:
"We need to find somebody to help us." Rosalina said.

Peach nodded. "Okay. That sounds like a good plan..." Peach then looked worried.

"What's wrong?" Rosalina asked her.

"W-Well, it's just, I don't want anyone to see me... Naked..." Peach whispered, nervously moving her hands around trying to cover herself better.

"Ah. I see how that could be a problem for someone of your standards." Rosalina said.

"But it's not a problem for you?" Peach thought, surprised by how Rosalina seemed fine with her exhibitionism. Then she spoke, "I think if we can make some makeshift clothes out of our dresses, if we work together. Okay?"

"Yes." Rosalina said. And the two shrunken women went to work.

Several minutes later, Peach, and even Rosalina had made some new clothes to wear. A little pink outfit for Peach, and a blue two-piece for Rosalina. Little being the key word, as the new outfits were rather revealing, since they only covered the tiny princesses privates.

"I guess these'll have to do..." Peach said, still feeling a bit exposed. "What do you think, Rosie?"

"I think they'll do just fine." Rosalina said.

"Good. Now, let's get going." Peach said.

Rosalina agreed and the two tiny women finally set off to try and find some help. But they hadn't even left the area before somebody showed up...
135222222222222212211111.title: Getting help is a priority, but first...

choices: More squeaking from under the dresses
1352222222222222122111111.content:
"Hold on, Peach." Rosalina says, putting her arm in front of her friend. "Someone's coming."

The two shrunken princesses watch carefully as they hear giant footsteps approach them, getting louder and louder as the person they belong to gets closer, until finally they see who it is...

"It's Daisy!" Peach exclaims in joy.

She was right, the princess of Sarasaland, Daisy, was coming up the hill. Dressed in her sports attire, she had come to take a little break, although she had told the others that she was going to go and find Peach and Rosalina. A little lie to keep up her tomboy appearance, and not appear weak.

Daisy was quite surprised when she made it up the hill and saw two discarded dresses lying on the ground. Bright pink and blue in color, she knew they must've belonged to Peach and Rosalina, respectively. But, where were the two princesses, and why would they just leave they're clothes on the ground? Daisy pondered these questions when she heard some loud squeaks coming from the dresses, she bent down and lifted up the empty dresses, looking for the source of the squeaking.

Meanwhile, Rosalina and Peach had been watching her every move from their worms-eye viewpoint, each standing on their own dresses, which weren't too far from each other. Peach was insisting to Rosalina that they get Daisy's attention, and that she would definitely help them out. Rosalina was more cautious of the new, seemingly giantess-sized princess though, telling Peach to wait and watch. But Peach could only wait so long before shouting up to her huge friend.

"Daisy! Down here!" Peach shouted. Of course, to Daisy, her shouts only registered as tiny squeaking noises. Peach saw Daisy bend down, and she thought Daisy had heard her cries for help. When she felt Daisy grab onto her dress that she was currently standing on, she wasn't sure what Daisy was doing. Then all of a sudden she was knocked off of her feet and sent flying onto her back! She only had a split second to see Daisy's confused face before her dress softly floated over her, covering her tiny form completely.

Daisy had reached down and quickly flipped the bright pink dress over, never noticing the shrunken princess standing on it. She thought there was a mouse or something under the dress making those squeaking noises she heard, so she was puzzled when she didn't see anything under it at all. Then she heard another squeak, this time it came from the blue dress.

"Ah, you're a sneaky little thing, aren't you?" Daisy commented, thinking the "mouse" had scurried under the nearby dress.

"Peach!" Rosalina cried again, worried about the other princesses fate. She was watching the scene, carefully watching for any sign that Peach was okay. As such, she had no time to react when she felt the floor beneath her quickly jut out from under her. And she soon suffered the same fate as Peach.

By now, Daisy was really confused, she had flipped both dresses over, rather quickly and unceremoniously to boot! But she never found out what was making those squeaking sounds. She wondered about that, and also about what could've happened to Rosalina and Peach.

"Where'd you go, you little vermin?" Daisy asked, looking at the ground. "Really weird! I was sure I heard something!"

Daisy wasn't sure what was going on, but she was more determined to get to the bottom of this then ever. She looked around the area again for any sign of her fellow princesses, when something got her attention...
1352222222222222122111111.title: Daisy hears a squeak

choices: They leave the stone as it is and go seek help
Rosalina tries to cover up the stone
13522222222222221221111111.content:
"What's this?" Daisy wondered aloud, looking at the strange glowing stone nearby.

Daisy got closer to the bright yellow rock, somewhat entranced by it low shimmer. She didn't waste any time in picking up the tennis ball-sized stone and examining it. She thought the stone was odd on its own, but she noticed that the longer she held it the weaker she felt, and she was having a hard time standing. She put two and two together and realized that this strange, glowing stone must be what is making her feel so tired. By now though, it was all too much, even for the tomboy princess to take, and she dropped the stone to the ground and sat down by a nearby tree to rest.

"Just g-give me a... minute..." Daisy mumbled to herself. She tried to keep herself awake for a little longer, hoping to get her energy back now that she wasn't holding the glowing stone. She had just noticed that everything seemed to be slowly getting bigger, and that was the last thing she saw before she passed out.

Meanwhile, Rosalina had just managed to crawl out from under her dress. Turning around, she saw Daisy slumped up against the tree, and the glowing stone on the ground beside her. She thought Daisy might've touched the cursed stone. Her suspicions were confirmed when she saw the brunette giantess shrink into her clothes.

"Oh, Daisy... Not you too!" Rosalina thought.

"Did you see that!? Daisy's shrinking too!" Peach shouted from afar.

Rosalina turned around again and saw that Peach had also escaped from underneath her own dress. The two girls met up with each other.

"We need to help her!" Peach insisted.

"Yes." Rosalina agreed.

The two shrunken princesses then went over to Daisy's yellow-colored clothing pile. They spotted a little lump in the giant pair of shorts Daisy had worn, and they knew that it must be Daisy herself. Hurrying inside the giant-sized clothes, Rosalina and Peach worked together to grab their newly reduced friend and drag her outside. Soon, all three shrunken women were outside, on top of Daisy's shorts.

"Oh my!" Peach exclaimed, looking away.

"What's the matter, Peach?" Rosalina asked.

"Can't you see?! Daisy's naked!" Peach exclaimed, and ran off towards Daisy's shirt.

"Going to make some more clothes?" Rosalina asked, giggling a little at Peach's plight.

"Yeah!" Peach shouted back, but not daring to look back at Daisy's nude body. "Are you going to help me?"

"Yes. I'm coming." Rosalina replied.

Daisy woke up a few minutes later. The last thing she remembered was resting up against a tree, and then she passed out for some reason. She felt something covering her though, and she looked down and saw a big yellow blanket. In fact, the whole floor she was on was yellow. Then she saw Princess Peach and Rosalina sitting nearby, wearing some rather poorly made clothes that didn't seem to fit them so well, and they also looked like they had been watching her for awhile, like they were waiting for her to wake up.

"Look, Rosie! She's up!" Peach exclaimed.

"Peach!? Rosalina!?" Daisy shouted, getting out of her covers and standing up. "What are you doing here? What happened to your clothes? And where are we anyway?"

Peach had quickly looked away when Daisy got up. Daisy wondered why, but then she felt something off and looked down, she was standing completely naked in front of the other princesses!

"W-Why am I naked!?" Daisy screamed and tried to cover herself up with her hands.

"Here, put this on." Rosalina said, holding out a rather small two piece outfit, it looked similar to the one Rosalina had on, except this one was yellow.

Daisy grabbed the clothing from Rosalina and turned around to put it on, it was very tight, but she got it on nonetheless. She spun back around, facing the other princesses. She saw Peach give her a little thumbs up, and she laughed.

"Okay. Would somebody tell me what's going on already?" Daisy asked.

Rosalina then went over all of the events leading up to now, including the unfortunate incident where Daisy had flipped the other tiny girls under their own dresses.

"Whoa, that's wild." Daisy said. "Heh, sorry about throwing you guys under the dress."

"Don't mention it!" Peach assured her. "We just want to get back to normal size."

"So do I!" Daisy said in agreement. "This stuff doesn't wear off, right?"

"If it does, it takes a rather long time." Rosalina answered, she been had shrunk first after all, and that was almost an hour ago.

"Yeah. So we really need to find someone to help us." Peach explained.

"Right. But, uh, what about that stone?" Daisy asked.

"What about it?" Rosalina asked.

"I mean, what if somebody finds it, and they shrink like we did?" Daisy asks. "I think we should try to cover it up. So nobody'll find it!"

"You've got a point, Daisy. I never thought of that!" Peach says. "What do you think, Rosie?"

"Hmm... " Rosalina says, weighing the options in her head. She knew the stone was dangerous, and she was worried about getting close to it again. But Peach was right, Daisy did have a point...
13522222222222221221111111.title: Daisy goes down

135222222222222212211111112.content:
"You're right, Daisy." Rosalina started. "Covering the stone would help keep any others from shrinking themselves on accident. And it might also help us."

"Okay. But how would it really help us?" Peach asked.

"Well, let's say that maybe, if we ever need to find the stone again. Then keeping it hidden under cover would make it harder for someone to find, and possibly take." Rosalina explained.

"Ah-ha! Of course!" Daisy said. "I hadn't thought of that other bit."

"Good thinking, Rosie!" Peach cheered. "You've got it all figured out!"

"Thanks, you two." Rosalina smiled. "Now, I also thought about how to cover it. And I thought using my dress would be best. It's the closest to the stone, and it's certainly big enough to get the job done."

"Okay. So, who's going to do it?" Daisy asked. "And don't say me! I don't want to go anywhere near that thing again!"

"Ah, but Daisy, wasn't this your idea?" Peach asked.

"Yeah.. But I'm really more of an idea person, somebody else should do the work!" Daisy said. "How about you Peach? Feeling up to it?"

"Uh, not really..!" Peach said.

"Don't worry, I'll cover it." Rosalina said confidently. She picked up her dress, and made her way over to the stone to cover it.

"Wow. Brains and bravery." Daisy whispered to herself as she watched the cosmic princess walk away.

It was all going well, until Rosalina accidentally dropped the dress. She went to go pick it up, but she tripped over it, almost falling over. Luckily, she found something to hold herself up and keep from falling completely over. Thinking that was a close one, she then got her bearings again and lifted herself off of the rock.

"Rock?" She thought. It was then that she realized that she had just used that strange, glowing stone to keep from falling down. She was worried about what might happen to her, now that she had touched it again, and then, she felt it happening again...

She was shrinking again! This time though, it all happened so fast, her shrinking only took several seconds before it stopped.

Rosalina hadn't passed out like before though, possibly because she was already shrunken, she wasn't sure why. What she was sure of was that she was now smaller then ever! Peach and Daisy ran up to the incredibly tiny princess. Rosalina was shocked when she saw that she didn't even reach the other girls' knees.

"Rosie, you're so tiny!" Peach exclaimed.

"I'm so sorry, Rosalina! This is all my fault!" Daisy cried. "Me and my bright idea..!"

"No, Daisy. It's my fault." Rosalina assured the bigger girl. "I accidentally touched the stone again. That's why I shrunk again, not because of you. I... Should've been more careful."

"Oh, Rosalina." Daisy whispered.

Peach suddenly picked up Rosalina, easily holding the twice shrunken woman in her hand. Peach examined Rosalina closely.

"Wow!" Peach exclaimed. "You're really little now!"

"Yes, Peach, I know." Rosalina said, with the slightest hint of annoyance in her voice. "Comparing myself to you, I'd say that I'm only about 2 inches tall now..."

Peach held Rosalina while Daisy watched, and the scene continued for sometime as the girls adjusted to Rosalina's new size. They had forgotten about covering the stone for now. They didn't even notice as someone approached them. It was...

141111212.content:
Jessica Drew and The Wasp had been assigned to deal with potential Hydra activity at a shipping yard. The two had found themselves a space on a warehouse rooftop to observe the activity, and then report back to the rest of the avengers.

"Alright, you ready to go Wasp?" Spiderwoman asked.

"Ready." The Wasp responded. "How many of them can you see from here?"

"I counted about five the first time I looked, but more of them could have arrived with the shipment. I don't think they would only bring five people for something as important as this is supposed to be."

"Well then there's either more of them or the intel wasn't accurate.Comms are working, I'm going in."

Suddenly the Wasp shrunk down to three inches tall, and sprouted tiny little wings out of her back. She flashed a thumbs up to her comparatively gigantic friend, who immediately gave one back. She then flew towards the shipping containers to observe.

Spiderwoman sat waiting for the Wasp to report back on her findings. She began to wonder what it would feel like to shrink down the Wasp's size. Suddenly her thoughts were interrupted.

"Jessica, there's at least three more guys than you saw in your initial sweep." A tiny voice came through Spiderwoman's ear piece. "They're hanging out inside this container, I'm going in for a better look of what's inside, over."

"Copy that, over." Jessica responded.

Haruna was walking through the school like she always did. But this time, she was thinking about something that Lala told her.

“With this, you’ll feel like a mouse.” Lala said.

Haruna looked at the pen and wondered what she meant. She pointed it at herself. As she looked at it, she pushed the pen. Suddenly a light came out and hit Haruna. Haruna noticed the world was now large.

“What happened?” Haruna asked herself while staring at the giant pen.

She noticed that...
145121.title: Shrinking pen

1451212.content:
Haruna quickly found her giant surroundings to be something of a shock to her system. It wasn't the first time Lala had done something like this, as she remembered the time Rito shrank as well. But never in her high school life did Haruna think she would shrink to the size of a mouse.

The tiny girl decided to pull out her rules from her school bag, which was more difficult than she anticipated at her new height. After a couple of minutes of struggling Haruna managed to get it out, and noticed her newfound height: a littlle more than 3 inches tall! During this time she also someone come out of a classroom. Haruna could feel every vibration of the person's foot as they stepped on the ground, causing the good to propel slightly upwards in the air each time they did so. But who was making those steps, anyway?
1451212.title: Tiny Haruna

14512121.content:
The footsteps belonged to her fellow classmate, Rito. He liked Haruna for the longest time and has had a massive crush on her for a while, but how would he react to a 3-inch tall Haruna? Haruna herself was worried that Rito might step on her, so the girl ran as fast as she could from him, but Rito's walking speed was significantly faster than Haruna's running speed and she began to worry.

"Stop!!" the tiny Haruna exclaimed, praying that Rito would hear her. To her surprise he stopped moving, wondering if he just heard something.

"Was that Haruna-chan?" he said to himself. "She sounded like she needed help..."

"I'm below you!! Down here!!" Haruna further added in exclamation. Rito then proceeded to look below him and saw the tiny girl.

"Haruna?!" Rito asked, confused, but not surprised. He quickly put two and two together and bluntly asked her. "Let me guess. Lala?"

"Y-yeah", Haruna shyly told him, feeling awkward next to a boy 50 times her height. "I borrowed a pen from her and it shrank me."

"Well, don't worry! I'll find her and return you to normal", Rito smiled, reaching out his left hand to the ground. Haruna quickly climbed on it, and Rito also grabbed Haruna's stuff she left on the ground when she shrank. As Rito raised his hand from the ground, Haruna held on to his middle finger with a death grip. To her it felt like being lifted over 100 feet in the air as Rito slowly lifted his left arm and placed Haruna in his shirt pocket.

"I know it will be bumpy, but don't worry. I'll protect you!" he assured the girl, who blushed a little when he told her this. Then Haruna snapped out of it and told Rito to quickly go find Lala. But where WAS Lala, anyway?

145121211221212121.content:
Rito had finally caught up to Lala on the roof, who smiled right in front of his eyes.

"Hi, Rito", she smiled innocently at the boy. "Did you come here to see me?"

"Well...partially", he told Lala, pointing to his pocket. "You see, Sairenji found your pen and she shrank. And the Kotegawa shrank, and.." Before Rito could say anything, she looked at the tiny girls residing in his pocket, and quickly picked all three of them up in her hands.

"Wow, you're all so cuuuuuuuute", Lala smiled, hugging the tiny girls in her hands.

"Knock it off!" an angered Yui fumed, unhappy of being squished between Lala's chest as she continued to be hugged.

"Lala-san, do you know a way to fix this?" a worried Haruna asked. Just then Lala proceeded to place the three tiny girls onthe ground.

"Well, I DO have an enlargment pen", she smiled, taking it out from her school uniform's right skirt pocket. "But I don't know if it will work..."

"Let's just get this over with", Yui sighed in frustration. "I have homework to do and have to make dinner for my big brother and I."

Lala clicked the pen and watched her fellow classmates' clothes grow back to their normal size. However, she didn't see the girls themselves grow along with them. The three started to look nervous as they saw themselves naked as the day they were born just a few seconds later, covering their privates and breasts with their hands as best they could before scrambling back into their clothes.

"Lala!!" sneered Run, unhappy being naked on the ground. "Don't any of your inventions ever actually work?!"

"Hey, leave her alone!" Rito yelled in reply, defending the alien girl, who blushed by his support towards her. "Lala's trying her hardest to help you out, and it's not like any of you guys know magic that can reverse this."

"Yuki-kun's right", agreed Haruna, talking to both an annoyed Yui and an angry Run. "Lala-san is only trying to help us, and she'll continue trying her hardest until she can restore our size."

"It's probably temporary anyway", added Rito. "It took me a few hours to restore my height when I shrank, so it should happen to you girls any minute." Rito bend his head to the girls as he said this, only to be greeted by annoyed sighs by Yui and Run, but a happier one from Haruna.

"But where should we go now? I don't want the school to see me like THIS", Yui asked, blushing. "It would ruin my reputation."

"I don't want anyone seeing me naked, either", added Haruna, also blushing.

Just then Lala chimed..
1451212112212121212.title: Big clothes, small girls

145121211221212122.content:
It turns out that Lala, too, was affected by the pen, which caused Rito and Yui to sigh, and Haruna and Run to look a little worried. She had kept her clothes, however.

"I'm going to guess you have more than one of these shrinking pens?" asked Rito bluntly to Lala while she was still in front of him, but she disappeared before he could ask her. She was fixated on the smaller girls in his pocket.

"Wow, you three are cute pocket-sized", Lala smiled. "Especially you, Ren-chan!"

"Leave me out of this", the girl frowned to Lala. "Just tell us how to reverse this spell, please."

"Please Lala-san!" Haruna asked, looking worried. "We can't stay tiny forever!"

"Well, I think it's temporary", Lala said out loud, rubbing her head in thought in confusion. "Or maybe it's permanent.."

"Permanent!?" Yui yelled. "For your sake I would hope not!"

Just then everyone heard someone enter the rooftop as well. Rito turned around and found yet another girl in front of him, putting up as far as he could down his left pant pocket. Lala flew in front of the girl to get a better look.
145121211221212122.title: Small Lala, too

14512121122122.content:
"Run, I'm not going to lie to you", Rito sighed. "Sairenji and Kotegawa are in my shirt pocket right now, inches tall from a device Lala made."

"Grr, that Lala", Run pouted. "She's always doing something stupid. I'm glad you told me the truth, Rito-kun." And with that, Run happily hugged the boy, with Haruna and Yui attempting to climb up as high up his pocket as possible to avoid getting squished by her chest.

"Stop it, Run! They're getting hurt!" Rito yelled. And with that, Run proceeded to stop hugging Rito, looking sad.

"I'm sorry", she whimpered, looking like a dog who just knocked down his master's table. Rito then sighed and simply told her, "It's not like that. I just don't want you squishing Sairenji and Kotegawa with your breasts."

"Life...flashing..before..eyes..", a dizzy Yui then commented.

"So, where IS Lala, anyway?" Run asked Rito, searching left and right while doing so. "It's not like her to be M.I.A. in situations like these."

"Maybe this was a set-up", Yui told Run from Rito's pocket. "Maybe she wants to shrink the whole school populous and use us as toys. Or something. I never really know what goes on through that girl's mind."

"Neither do I, and I'm with her every day", Rito added, taking out his cell phone. "I'm gonig to call Mikan and see if Lala came home already." Rito proceeded to dial his home phone number, waiting for a ring to come. During that time he picked up the pen and put it in his pocket once again. A few rings went up before he got a signal and someone answered it. It was..
14512121122122.title: Rito tells the truth

choices: Haruna and Yui take up Rito's offer
145121211221222.content:
After a few seconds someone answered the phone. If Rito was lucky it would be Lala. But would it?

"Hello?", the voice asked. At that moment Rito proceeded to sigh. It wasn't Lala: it was his sister, Mikan.

"Rito, is that you?" Mikan asked, annoyed. "This better not be a prank call!"

"Mikan", Rito proceeded to ask his sister. "Did Lala come home yet?"

"Lala-san came home for a little while, if that's what you mean. She said she business to do downtown. Something about buying a present for you."

"For me? Why would she do that?"

"Look, I don't know, and I was watching something just before you called. I'll call you if I hear anything else from you. Bye."

And with that, the phone call between brother and sister ended rather quickly.

"So she's downtown", Yui said unsurely. "That's odd.."

"Yuuki-kun, is it your birthday soon?" asked Haruna, thinking that might be the reason Lala was buying him a gift.

"Actually, my birthday was months ago", he replied, a sweat drop falling down his head. "Lala even celebrated it, then."

"Then what on could it possibly be?" Run added while thinking as well.

Just then, Rito hold his phone ringing in his pocket again. He then proceeded to pick it up and answer it. This time he got a message not from his sister, but from Lala herself!

"Hello, Rito! Mikan told me you were looking for me. What's up?"

"Lala, your pen you gave Sairenj shrunk her and Kotegawa! We need you to fix this!" an an angry Rito told Lala.

"Don't worry, Rito", a happy Lala replied over the phone. "The effects only last for 24 hours. Then they'll be back to their normal size. See you at home for diiner, Bye!"

And with that, the phone call between the two ended then as well.

"24 HOURS?!" an annoyed Yui yelled. "I have homework to do and chores to get done!"

"My older sister will never believe this", Haruna sadly sighed.

"Don't worry, Sairenji and Kotegawa", a confident Rito told them. "You can stay with me!"

"WHAT!?" replied Haruna and Yui at the same time, blushing.

"Don't worry about it. Mikan already knows about this whole magic stuff, and Lala...well, I'll try to keep Lala away from you two. So what do you say?"

info.brief_description: Females from comics, animated series and videogames shrink.
info.description:
Female characters from various comics, animated series and videogame series are reduced in size.

Girls shrink in size from 2 to 6 inches. No shrunken guys, no gts, no vore, no unbirthing. Other than that, have fun.

New: Auto-Reward Gift Points awarded for updates and reviews.
